name: Void Red
summary: An interactive card game that stirs memories and emotions. In silence, the cards speak, touching the depths of the heart. Philosophical space and tension quietly envelop the players.

name: Voids Vigil
summary: Blast your way through robotic hordes in this auto-battler arena shooter. Use auto-firing guns and drones, timely dashes and special abilities to reach The Void where a randomly constructed final Conservator awaits convergence. Spend your Cogs wisely among the shops to create unique builds!

name: Vow of the Wordlocks
summary: Vow of the Wordlocks is a Roguelike where you cast spells with a Scrabble board-the higher the score, the stronger the sorcery. The player controls one of the witchers who swore a vow to become a Worldock, engaging enemies with bizzare fates and bosses with tragic histories.

name: Void Flesh
summary: Void Flesh is a survival horror FPS that follows your trek into the Astaria Research Facility which has gone radio silent two weeks prior to your arrival.

name: Volara
summary: A flight adventure game where you soar through amazing worlds just by moving your hand. Explore beautiful environments, earn badges, discover secrets, overcome challenging boss fights and become a top pilot.

name: Voronica Cleans House: a Vore Adventure
summary: A visual novel with high interactivity, 'Voronica Cleans House' currently includes an hour of voracious gameplay, five potential transformations, nine victims, five main characters, a hundred and twenty five Full HD CG renders, over 10,000 words and way too many sprites!

name: Voidwatch
summary: Voidwatch is a silky-smooth space shooter roguelike. Hop from planet to planet, facing off against the Cult of the Void as you fight to free the galaxy from their clutches. Collect new weapons and powerful modifications to improve your Voidhawk Infiltrator starship & lay waste to your foes!

name: Voidrunner
summary: A sci-fi first-person parkour survival game where every fall forces you to start again. Master your kinetic suit’s double jump and grappling tether as you navigate shifting platforms, obey cryptic AI commands, and uncover the truth. Will you survive long enough to remember why you’re here?

name: Voice Love on Air
summary: This game is a BL dating sim game with a unique twist of voice acting and studio management elements. The story tells how Aki, a new voice director who has to complete several BL Dramas, and the charming voice actors fall in love with each other.

name: Voodoo Whisperer Curse of a Legend
summary: The entire town has been put into a deep, dark sleep by a mysterious evil force. Now young Lillian must find allies and uncover the dark secrets of voodoo in order to save her master and free her friends before it is too late.

name: Volvo: The Game
summary:
"Volvo – The Game" is a free racing simulation video game for Microsoft Windows, developed by SimBin Studios (later KW Studios) and released on May 26, 2009. The game was developed with the intention of showcasing the interior and exterior of Volvo cars.

The game includes a selection of Volvo vehicles: the Volvo C30, S60, S40, 850, 240 Turbo Group A, and the S60 Concept car.

Players can drive these cars on two race tracks: the Gothenburg Eco Drive Arena in Sweden and the Autodrome Chaika in Ukraine.

"Volvo – The Game" offers several gameplay modes: "Quick Race," "Time Attack" (which includes a ghost car system for players to race against previous lap times), and an online "Competition" mode. The game features adjustable difficulty settings and driving aids such as ABS, traction control, and stability assistance. Multiple camera perspectives are available, including a driver's seat view, alongside a replay feature.

name: Void Wave: Drift
summary: Customize your Ionblade and race through gravity-defying tracks in Void Wave Drift, a sleek anti-gravity combat racer. Use powerups, destroy the track to forge shortcuts, and master the Drift in a high-speed fight for glory across the galaxy.

name: Voxelaxy
summary:
Using only a limited set of tools, you have to survive in a hostile environment. Crafting oxygen and finding food seems almost impossible...
Are you ready?!

name: Vortex Attack
summary:
Vortex Attack is a frenetic arcade space shooter featuring worldwide tournaments and an intense local multiplayer mode.
A worthy successor to Galaga for the XXI century.

WARNING: Highly addictive.

name: Voxel Sword
summary: A comical versus game for everyone to enjoy! Voxel Sword is an easy to play action game, set in an adorable toy fantasy world, where you can wield various weapons to defeat monsters. This is our toy fantasy world, Voxel. Since ancient times, humans and monsters have worked together and coexisted in peace.

name: Void Raider
summary: In the depths of a ruined galaxy, laws no longer exist. You embody a Void Raider, a space marauder with no ties, ready to do anything to get your hands on rare resources and forgotten artifacts.

name: Void Dungeon
summary: Void Dungeon brings you a 2D Action RPG with intense hack & slash combat, deep character options, and unyielding enemies, which you can face solo or with up to 4 friends. Oh, and quirky costumes. Because it’s better to look good when the void consumes you.

name: Voltage: Episode 2
summary: In Episode 2, you try to bring freedom to Voltage and fight against evil forces as you traverse the Voltage Town, Red Forest and many other areas. Your mission is to find resistance scientists, together you might be able to bring peace to the Voltage.

name: Voltron: Defender of the Universe
summary: Voltron was an anime series starring the giant robot of the same name from the 1980s. The full robot is actually made up of five mechanical Lions piloted by the Voltron Force. When the young pilots combined their forces to create the mighty Voltron they would defend the universe from the evil King Zarkon of Planet Doom.

name: Voidstalker
summary: Into the Void, at your own risk. No menus, no saves. Difficult and potentially confusing game. Lore-Rich / Metroidvania / Hacking Simulator / FPS / 3D Platformer. May just have more in common with a puzzle box than a game.

name: Void Raiders
summary: Void Raiders is sci-fi top down shooter focused on character progression and shooting both humans & aliens that stands in your way to become most feared raider on Neptune planet. Blast your way through many exotic locations, collect mysterious artifacts, powerful relics and shards of power to upgrade your characters, their equipment and even Lone Invader tavern which serves as a base of your marauding operations.

name: Voidspace
summary: A highly experimental SCIFI sandbox MMORPG. Using only 2D, top-down visuals, we're attempting to push the limits of the MMO genre to create a game world that is similar in some ways to Ready Player One. Featuring perma-death, and player societies. Every man-made object is crafted by a real player.

name: Void Terrarium Plus: Toriko Care Set
summary:
DLC for void tRrLM(); //Void Terrarium available for Nintendo Switch and PlayStation 4 in Japan.
The DLC content is included in the PlayStation 5 version of the game by default.

The DLC includes customization options for Toriko, new diseases to deal with and new actions for Toriko.

name: Volt: Battery on the Loose
summary: You were on the way to a recycling process when fortunately for you - and unfortunately for the environment - you accidentally ran off. Now your goal is to escape from the facility, which is an extremely difficult task due to the fact that you are a battery without legs.

name: Voez
summary:
Voez is played by touching falling notes in time with the music.

Set in a fictional town named Lan Kong Town, which is modelled after Yilan in Taiwan, the story is centred around six high school students who form a band that eventually achieves international fame.

Gameplay is simple, requiring players to touch vertically falling notes that have hit a bar on the bottom of the screen.

Depending on the song, the number of lanes for the notes increases and they shift side to side, making the screen look as if it is dancing to the music.

There are over 100 songs in the library. Three difficulty levels Easy, Hard and Special are available. Players are able to choose difficulty levels according to their skill so they may enjoy all pieces.

name: Vortex Protocol
summary: A multiplayer co-op adventure where you travel through magical dimensions to solve puzzles, fight guardians, and bring back home powerful energy for profit.

name: Void Whispers
summary: Assume the role of a broadcast engineer in a tranquil city. All seems peaceful until the sky above starts to reveal something deeply unsettling.

name: Voice of the Wizard by Brett Farkas
summary: Voice of the Wizard is a 100% voice recognition controlled adventure game. Explore an open world of forests, fields, and shorelines. Learn spells, solve mysteries, and defeat enemies. It's up to you to be the Voice of the Wizard.

name: Voronium - Locust Sols
summary: Mash-up of tower defense and VR FPS - set in a Tech noir setting

name: VocabVan
summary: Embark on an educational adventure with VocabVan, the engaging application designed to supercharge your language learning journey! Tailored for language enthusiasts and learners, VocabVan offers a fun and interactive way to master foreign language vocabulary.

name: Voyeur
summary:
Like To Watch?

You'll get an eye-full as you peer into your neighbors' sordid lives in the wickedly seductive interactive mystery, Voyeur. Political blackmail... murder... seductive intrigue... you'll see it all. But will you only watch - hidden like a true voyeur - or will you step into the drama and try to prevent a murder?

Voyeur combines dramatic game play with chilling suspense and erotic undertones guaranteed to keep your excitement level up. Hollywood actors, excellent film quality and an alluring storyline make this a sizzling thriller that will bring our the voyeur in everyone. Come on. We know you want to watch.

name: Voyna
summary: So you think you’re the chosen one, do you? The one to finally find the Vuadzha and put an end to millennia of Virtual Holy Wars? What breathtaking arrogance! Typical Steam gamer. Although… come closer, human. Hmmm. Maybe. Just maybe. It could be you. Shall we find out?

name: Vox Populi: Canada 2025
summary: Play as an existing or fully customisable political figure, and campaign for many alternative Canadian elections! In "Vox Populi: Canada 2025", you and the characters around you must promote your ideas and your popularity throughout the country to claim victory!

name: VoxelCity
summary:
This is the premium city building game you have been waiting for!
VoxelCity is a strategy focused city builder with a board game feel. Balance your finances, keep your people happy, and provide them with the things they need. No fiddly micromanaging to worry about.
Do you love old school city builders? Then you probably hate the current crop of city building games available today. But this one is different. Build your city without ever waiting on timers or paying for any ephemeral IAPs.

name: Vomitoreum
summary:
A dark and arid hellscape inspired by the likes of Metroid Prime and Dark Souls, Vomitoreum is an FPS Metroidvania set in an interconnected and nightmarish world.

Explore a land that has been plagued with an eldritch infection, a horrible fog that blankets the world and turns it’s denizens into wretched mutants. Delve deep into the ruins of this plagued world and find a cure for this horrid blight.

You are the Nephilem, a vessel born of cosmic ash and the churning souls trapped within graves. Created as a being able to survive the hellish environment and search for a way to make the fog recede, you will scour the lands in search of tools and weaponry that will be useful on your journey.

The Nephilem’s end goal is to make the infection and the fog recede, destroy the horrible demons plaguing the land, and let life flourish once again.

name: Void Jump VR
summary: Void Jump VR - platformer where precision jumping and perfect timing are your only lifelines in a stylish, sci-fi void

name: Voltline
summary:
Connect the spark, calm your mind.
A relaxing logic puzzle where each tap sparks a chain reaction across the grid.

name: Voice of the Ancients
summary:
Let me tell you a story! Meanwhile, you can sit at the fireplace, close your eyes, and listen to the tale about ancient hidden treasures and secret societies. This time, you won't just listen. You will be the hero of the story. It will be your adventure. Your voice guides the way. Can you solve the mystery just with your voice?

My game is highly optimized for blind and visually impaired people (thanks to the extensive testing by the Applevis forum members). Still, I developed the game also for other kinds of users:
For intermediate and advanced English learners, this game offers an unparalleled opportunity to enhance your spoken English skills.
And for all adventure enthusiasts, this game rekindles the power of imagination, often stifled by the graphical grandeur of modern video games.
Unleash your inner detective and unravel the mysteries that lie ahead, solely using your voice as your compass.
With the first episode available for free, what are you waiting for? Embark on this extraordinary journey today and discover the magic of storytelling through voice.

name: Voidface
summary: Face off in a challenging bullet-hell arena shooter to try and clear bite-sized boss rush challenges. Learn to dodge their attacks, cast spells to gain an upper hand, and kill everything that gets in your way.

name: Void Grapplers
summary: Void Grapplers is a super fast platforming roguelike with the crazy movement of games like Sonic Mania, Pizza Tower, and Grapple Dog, along with the funky style of Antonblast, Sonic Rush, and Garbanzo Quest. Join Jac, Giromo, and their friends as they dash, swing, and zip through several procedurally generated levels.

name: Void Gore
summary: From the creators of Project Starship comes a new and nightmarish arcade shoot’em up experience. Void Gore casts you as an ace pilot descending through the levels of hell and getting rich in the process. Earn coins as you take down supernatural horrors in pulse-pounding vertical scrolling style, then spend them on upgrades to keep yourself alive and prove your skills against online leaderboards!

name: Volontés
summary: Volontés is an Dark Fantasy × Suspense otome game in which the main character, who has lost everything, finds her way of life while facing tragedy.

name: Void Breaker
summary: Void Breaker is a space-based tower defense shooter where players protect their ship's cockpit from incoming asteroid storms. Using mouse-aimed energy cannons and view controls, players can engage in either an endless survival mode or progress through star-rated levels, all set against the backdrop of deep space.

name: Vojna
summary: A soldier searches for documents in a desolate zone at night. Suddenly, a voice on the radio, claiming to be a fallen enemy, warns that any negotiation error could awaken evil forces in the forest.

name: Void Protocol
summary: Void Protocol is a single-player horror adventure game set in the eerie future. Solve interesting puzzles, while hiding from insidious horrors waiting for you in the shadows.

name: Vox Machinae
summary: "Take command and pilot a giant fighting machine in an escalating war between powerful corporations. Select your GDR ("Grinder") chassis and customize it with a powerful arsenal of lasers, missiles, cannons and more as you’re pitted against rival Grinder squads. Engage in seamless drop-in multiplayer action with no loot-box or micro-transaction nonsense. Vox Machinae respects your time, and your wallet."

name: Voidpet Dungeon
summary:
Battle through the Void, where all the monsters are based on emotions!
Collect rare creatures, battle big bosses, and build your dream team of Voidpets in this 4v4 battle RPG.

name: Voidspire Tactics
summary: An indie turn-based Tactics RPG with a heavy emphasis on exploration, character progression, and highly tactical combat. Create your own deeply customizable party of Warriors, Sorcerers, and Shiftcloaks to take on the Spire!

name: Void Protocol
summary: Fight your way through up to nine levels, firing and collecting your projectile. Can you find all three endings? Defeat the enemies, seal the breach, repeat!

name: Volcanon
summary: "Volcanon" is a 2D platformer game with a focus on analog sticks and speedrunning.In this pixelly beautiful world, unleashing the magma power and facing these well-design levels.

name: Voltage High Society
summary: Punch, evolve, escape! This cyberpunk FPS Metroidvania pits you against horrific cyber-monstrosities as you master deadly abilities to break free from the derelict prison island of Nemo Ultra.

name: Void Blitzing
summary: Void Blitzing is a top-down action roguelite set in space with randomized levels and a challenging movement system. Fight over 18 unique enemies, Upgrade your ship, Modify your weapons and survive.

name: Volo Airsport
summary: Volo Airsport is for those who fly like birds whenever they close their eyes. Take to the skies and fly past mountains in a wingsuit. Try to hug the cliffs at over 250 km/h or cruise at high altitudes and admire the scenery. Your body and gear are fully physically simulated. You fly by controlling your character's muscles directly, which changes your pose, which interacts with the air around you. You can see, hear, and feel every gust of wind as you pass it.

name: Volfied
summary:
Once in the game, using the arrow keys you can move the 'Scanner' ship around the 'Shield Line' at the parameter of the playing area. While moving around this edge the ship is protected from the aliens by a shield indicated by a glowing circle around the ship. This shield is not infinite and care should be taken to complete each level as quickly as possible. A counter indicates the level of shield that you have: when it reaches zero then any contact with an alien is deadly whether you are on the 'Shield Line' or not.
The idea of the game is to cut areas out of the screen without touching any of the aliens. This is done by pressing the SPACE key which initiates the 'Laser Cutter' and moving off the 'Shield Line' and rejoining it somewhere else. While you are in the process of drawing a line, your shield is inactive and touching an alien is fatal. Similarly, if one of the aliens touches the line then it will send a charge down the line towards you and you must quickly return to the safety of the edge before it reaches you.

When you rejoin the 'Shield Line' the area that does not contain the 'Boss' alien will be filled (points are gained by trapping the other aliens) and the 'Shield Line' will be adjusted to surround the area that is left. The level is completed when a certain percentage of the total area has been filled in. This percentage starts at 80% but may increase in the later levels.

name: Voodoo Chronicles: The First Sign
summary:
Help out James Voodoo as he investigates mysterious attacks through the forsaken hamlet of Ravenhill, the wealthy city of Richtown, and a variety of breathtaking sceneries inspired by major fiction genres: adventure, film noir, thriller, steam punk, and more!

With over 50 scenes to investigate, numerous puzzles, oodles of hidden objects to find, and a captivating story told through cut scenes and voice acting, "Voodoo Chronicles: The First Sign" will let you embark on an adventure you won't want to stop!

name: Votica
summary: Votica is a election simulation game. Create your politician, run a strategic campaign, and win the votes of Velkarya's citizens. Every election is unique thanks to randomized demographics. With both single-player and multiplayer modes, it offers a humorous yet deep political experience.

name: Volleying
summary: Volleying is a physics-based game where the objective is to make the ball touch the ground of your opponent's side.

name: Void Tyrant
summary: The galaxy is in disarray and great danger in this hybrid card and RPG. Choose your hero from one of several different powerful classes and search distant planets. Combat is more than just who has the higher stats or fancier weapons. You'll need to carefully consider your options and plan throughout each encounter, since only the person who wins the round gets to deal damage. You and your opponent take turns laying down numbered cards, choosing wether to hit or stand, in an effort to get as close to a value of 12 without going over. You'll also be able to play unique skills or items that can modify the value of your opponent's hand or your own, cast spells or wield attacks, and more. You may even be joined by allies who add their own special cards to your deck.

name: Voidcutter Fuzor
summary: Battle through waves of enemies, taking their power for your own in this retro-styled arcade shoot'em up.

name: Voidwalkers: The Gates of Hell - Death to the Heretics!
summary: Outpost Charlie has finally been breached by the realm of the dead. The entities of The Void have started the process of turning the land into a toxic wasteland. You and your team have been tasked with holding the line until evacuation procedures can be completed.

name: Voima
summary: VOIMA wants YOU! Play as a silly bear in wild forests, build buildings to life, explore worlds, and mod universes. Play it, then make it yours.

name: Voyage Router
summary: Voyage Router is a "navigation-based roguelike" where you explore procedurally generated terrain guided by your map. Adapt your route as the environment and conditions change, and visit as many target points as possible.

name: Volar
summary: Help Volar outrun their past as you jump, smash, and power your way through levels in this one-button platformer that is *not* an autorunner. Explore 5 unique worlds, using collectable masks to ignite, freeze, electrocute, and more. Each level presents a new challenging twist to test your skills!

name: Vow
summary: Vow is a mystical game about a cursed village frozen between sunset and night. Explore abandoned houses, read birch bark letters, and observe ancient rituals to uncover the mystery of the disappearance of its inhabitants — and your own fate.

name: Void Rush
summary: Void Rush is a fast-paced action roguelike boss rush game in a magical, fantastic setting. Trapped within a dark void, you face relentless bosses with unearthly powers. Escape may seem possible, but why seek freedom when you can conquer the souls of your enemies time and time again?

name: Vox Populi Vox Dei 2
summary:
Your adventure is not over yet, the real enemy has appeared. Dr. Wolf has taken your lovely girl and you won't stop until you find her.
To accomplish your mission, you will pass through many difficult challenges, putting your own life at risk.

name: Volatility
summary:
Explore an interconnected world unfolding as you acquire new abilities, each region brimming with secrets to uncover as you learn your purpose in a collapsing artificial world.
Volatility is a Zelda-like with metroidvania elements, which sees you navigating a bizarre landscape in search of a way home.

name: VoltAge:Genesis
summary:
Much of Marema was destroyed by the Empire of Garen decades ago. The radioactive fallout destroyed most of the tropical rainforests and verdant countryside for which Marema was famous, leaving behind only a desert waste known as “The Deadlands”. In the century following the war, the once proud country of Marema has fallen into a slow decline from which it may never recover, with recent efforts at peace with Garen having mixed results. Twenty years after The Reclamation, the people of Marema are beginning to venture out into the Deadlands once more, but tribalism and economic struggles have left the few settlements which remain in a precarious position…meanwhile, the rest of the world continues on as it largely has, indifferent to the struggles of the Mareman people.

Now, just days before the signing of a bill granting land ownership to any brave soul willing to finish what The Reclamation began, two young adventurers prepare to claim their piece of the Deadlands, not realizing that they will soon be swept up in the latest chapter of a struggle that has been playing out for thousands of years; a war for the very future of mankind.

And it remains to be seen if they will survive the Volt Age...

name: Voxelotl Garden
summary: Raise, train, and breed Voxelotl to create the most unique Voxelotl patterns and shapes. Feed them treats to keep them happy and level up their skills in training exercises. Participate in races to test your Voxelotl’s skills. Enjoy spending time with your cute Voxelotl pets!

name: Vox Populi: Australia 2025
summary: Play as an existing or fully customisable political figure, and campaign for many alternative Australian elections! In "Vox Populi: Australia 2025", you and the characters around you must promote your ideas and your popularity throughout the country to claim victory!

name: Voidblazers
summary: Voidblazers is a story-driven shoot 'em up game for Playdate. Join the crew of Icarus as they travel across the galaxy, battle various fleets, and encounter new friends and enemies on their daring mission.

name: Void: Emma
summary: A 2D side-scrolling point-and-click puzzle game. A mouse awakens in a nightmare, with no memory of who he is. But one image lingers in his mind — the one he loved most. Why is she gone? Find the way out. Find her.

name: Voyager
summary: A brick game variant with a built-in famiclone board.

name: VonGarland Castle: Beyond Blood
summary: prepare yourself for side scrolling survival horror action. Ransom VonGarland must journey to Mayhem Island and the ruins of VonGarland Castle to find her brother and uncover the truth of what Plasmadine corporation is doing on the island

name: Volunteer
summary: Experience first-person horror and fight to survive in a chaotic landscape infested with bloodthirsty creatures.

name: Void Drift
summary: Void Drift is a survival roguelike space shooter where you explore unque battlefields, evolve powerful weapons face relentless enemy swarms and take on bosses, adapt your strategy, and survive the chaos of the void!

name: Voidwalkers: Exodus
summary: Your the time has come, Exile. Aemon has woken and his children have taken up arms in form of a rebellion. They strike at the heart of our civilization, hoping to cripple the Temple of Nine and slay the members of the Council. It is your duty to lead our people to a new home.

name: Volley Pals
summary: A chaotic, cartoon style arcade volleyball game with local multiplayer for up to 4 people. It's designed as a party game with each level featuring different themes and mechanics.

name: Void81
summary: VOID81 is a 3D platform game with survival horror elements, where you explore ever-changing levels, solve puzzles, avoid dangers, and traverse surreal worlds inspired by the retro atmosphere of the 1980s.

name: Voyage on the Alihacc Desert
summary: "This desert was once a sea... This desert was once a sky..." A lone traveler in the desert: me. Shells, eggshells, the towering dance hall, the twins Kawanina and Kawasakana, the duck habitat, the monster Rokunag, a girl’s song, crossing the shrubland at night... Lukhischa Oasis, flowing... I am.

name: Vox in Tenebris
summary: Explore an sealed crypt and ravel its sacred secrets as an archivist priest. Use your Faith against the looming horrors. Bannish them and make your path before your lantern lights off or you will lost your way and your mind.

name: Voxel Panic
summary: Blast your way through swarms of robotic enemies in this fast-paced, retro-style sci-fi FPS!

name: Void Tech
summary: A story-driven sci-fi adventure where you repair satellites in Earth's orbit while unraveling corporate secrets. Navigate dangerous space debris, manage resources, and banter with mission control in a game packed with humor, mystery, and tough choices.

name: VoltRhythm
summary:
VoltRhythm is a retro-futuristic four-key rhythm game where rhythm play generates power. Accurate rhythm play emits a large amount of "rhythm energy," which can be converted to usable electricity with surprising efficiency. Your goal is to fill the energy reserves by playing as many songs as possible with as much accuracy as possible.

Though, what is the reason for gathering this much energy...?

name: Void Martyrs
summary: A grimdark survival horror about a nun in a space suit. Scavenge amongst drifting space cathedrals, balance your faith with survival, and craft the tools of your salvation.

name: Void-Dogs
summary: A third-person rails shooter. Dive through space in the 25th Century in an effort to save mankind.

name: Volgarr the Viking I & II Bundle
summary: Become Volgarr the Viking in these two precise, hardcore 2D action-platformers.

name: Voxel Shot for Nintendo Switch
summary: Voxel Shot is a simple pick up and play action game set in an adorably quirky world of toys where you and your friends beat up zombies (and each other!) using a variety of different weapons. A world ravaged by zombified toys infected with a mysterious virus. Day after day, the toys fight for control of the remaining resources. Defeat unique zombies with a variety of weapons at your disposal! There are even cars and motorcycles to ride around in each stage!

name: Voxel Project
summary: Voxel Project offers an immersive sandbox experience set in a fully destructible voxel environment. Explore a dynamic world teeming with vehicles, dynamic fire mechanics, enemy NPCs, voxel gore, weapon customization, and a bunch of additional features to discover.

name: Volume
summary: Volume is a near-future retelling of the Robin Hood legend, starring Danny Wallace (Thomas Was Alone), Charlie McDonnell and award-winning, critically-acclaimed actor Andy Serkis (The Lord of the Rings, Planet of the Apes) as Gisborne.

name: Voidsayer
summary: The world has fallen into darkness, cursed by the Abyss. You are one of the many hapless survivors at risk of being consumed. Unlike others, you have a chance to fight back. Voidsayer is a dark monster tamer jRPG. Assemble your monster team, take on eldritch horrors, and return hope to the world.

name: Void Terrarium
summary:
"Even in the darkest times, hope is homegrown. Void Terrarium chronicles the story of a robot and a young girl in a world devastated by enigmatic events. Explore hauntingly beautiful ruins in search of food and supplies, outfit and maintain the "terrarium" in which you live, and do whatever it takes to protect and nurture the last surviving human in this care simulator-meets-roguelike title."

void tRrLM(); //Void Terrarium is a roguelike RPG set in a ruined world contaminated by fungi, starring the last human girl Toriko and a helper robot. Since Toriko is unable to survive in the polluted world, the player takes on the role of the helper robot, who must replenish the environment of the “Terrarium” where she spends each day.

name: Voids Adrift
summary:
Voids Adrift® is a Player Crafted Multiplayer, 
 
You start in the Void Salvaging Ships from Sunken lost ships and build your way into the sky where you live out your days until you get sent back into the void, 
 
You start in the pitch black void. An ashy fog rolls about you. The only thing in sight are a few faintly glowing void shards with metals floating around them. Using a torch to scavenge up some metals near the closest shard, you craft components to make a basic raft and float up out of the darkness on your boat. 
 
You see an island and travel there. A group of Dwarves called the Fwaran cautiously greet you. They talk of the dangerous Bransellian living in the desert. They eye you suspiciously. Will you help them? You hear murmurs about travelling to the snow. Apparently the tools they need to win a war are there. What war are they talking about? Impressive steam ships chug along nearby like trains in the sky, billowing massive clouds. As you stare back at your dinghy, you wonder if it's time for an upgrade to a new frame, or if you should just slap on a few more engines and get going. 
 
Voids Adrift includes a skill tree of various fighting styles, with gun-play, sword, and bombardier as unique play-styles. 
 
You can see dozens of players roaming about and the world feels like it's breathing. Shots pop off back and forth in the distance. 
 
Build on the Seas, Clouds, Sky and Islands. 
 
Choose your destiny!

name: [ VOID ]
summary: A black-and-white 3D exploration game set in a surreal, textless world. Wander through shifting landscapes, encounter enigmatic creatures, and uncover hidden truths in a dreamlike void.

name: Volcanoids
summary: A base-building open-world survival shooter that replaces the typical base with a giant drill. Alone or with friends, explore an island plagued by eruptions, upgrade your drill, and battle robots to uncover what's been hiding beneath the surface.

name: Volkhv: Memoir of the Witch Doctor
summary: Discover untouched native lands and seek magical herbs and ingredients required for long-forgotten potions. Lift curses and banish evil spirits! In a Volkhv simulator, you're the one deciding to either bring aid or cause a slow, painful death.

name: Void of Lilly
summary: Void of Lilly is an adventure in the world of the near future with JRPG elements and Bullet Hell battles! Help Ann to find her sister and uncover secrets of this world... Void of Lilly is coming on Steam for free!

name: Voyage: A Sorceress' Vacation
summary: Completely new levels with a bunch of different styles, more than a dozen new music tracks and even more sound effects, many new features and a few surprises is what we put into this hack, making it a completely different game than Alex Kidd in Miracle World. This is what began its life as a competition entry named “Ma Kai Quest”. Get ready to help our heroine to make her vacation enjoyable in the end and complete all 17 levels. But will completing them be enough to succeed?

name: Volleyball Champions 3D
summary: Realistic Physics combined with intuitive controls and beautiful graphics make this the best Volleyball game on mobile. Swipe your finger to send the ball flying in the direction you want, it is easy to learn and fun to master.

name: VoxSys
summary: Step into the future with VoxSys, the exhilarating arena shooter that combines cooperative PvP combat with innovative building mechanics. Strategize and use your cover to your advantage! Destroy your opponents and earn the title of Intergalactic Champion.

name: Voice Paradise
summary:
The hero of the game is in his space ship, on the way to his home planet. But the space ship crash-lands on the Earth. The hero is on an important intergalactic mission and has to be on his home planet no later than in one month. He tries to figure out what caused the crash, and discovers that it was a voice that interfered with the ship's radio waves. Suddenly, three anime girls appear in front of him. They are Citron, Jasmine, and Cinnamon, the heroines of a TV anime series called "Elfin Triangle". They explain that the voice that caused the disturbance was that of a famous Japanese voice actress.... they just don't know which one. To get a sample of this voice would be the only hope to repair the ship... so the hero and his three lovely companions have to find out who the voice belongs to!

Voice Paradise plays, for the most part, like an adventure game with an internal schedule. A visit to every locations costs one game day, and the hero has only 30 days to find the voice actress. The locations include TV studio, CD shop, and other locations that have anything to do with anime and voice acting. The game contains plenty of material about Japanese voice actresses, so it can be described as educational. In order to successfully locate the actress, it is necessary to gather as much information as possible and take part in quiz that would narrow down the search and bring the hero nearer to the goal.

name: Voxel Delvers
summary: Descend into procedurally generated dungeons with up to 4 players. Master 4 unique classes, slay bosses, claim legendary loot, and push deeper into the darkness. A voxel co-op dungeon crawler where every run is different.

name: Volta-X
summary: Volta-X blends real-time decision-making and strategy into action-packed 1v1 battles. Customize and operate your own giant robots, called Voltas, and manage a diverse crew of pilots as they build up their base from scratch. Unlock and upgrade new weapons as you climb the ranks, and explore nearly endless customization combinations to improve your roster of Voltas. Players will also be able to dive into Volta-X’s thrilling single-player campaign. As the story unfolds, the pilots will have to work together to prove themselves as the best of the best, while discovering dramatic secrets about each other, and the global threats lurking in the shadows of the WVA’s past.

name: Vox Populi: Europa 2024
summary: Play as an existing or fully customizable political figure, and campaign for many alternative European elections! In "Vox Populi: Europa 2024", you and the characters around you must promote your ideas and your popularity throughout the continent to claim victory!

name: Void Collections
summary:
The Void Collections Collectible Collections Game is a Twitch extension minigame that lets followers earn packs of collectible digital cards by hanging out in a channel!

Viewers are rewarded for the cumulative time they keep a channel open. With original art depicting strange and creatures called "voidlings" that range from creepy to cute, you'll want to collect them all!

As if collecting all the voidlings wasn't enough: can you collect all the collections? Exchange extra copies for shinier and shinier versions! Plus, there's a chance to find special version of some cards, and fill in even more hidden collections...

name: Voodolls
summary: Voodolls is a co-op tower defence experience steeped in the dark & mysterious world of voodoo. Trapped in the jaws of hell, four souls are given the chance of freedom by a mysterious voodoo priest who distils their essence into voodoo dolls. Take up their offer and begin your break for freedom!

name: Voidnomaly
summary: You finally got a good job, with an incredible payment for just 4 days of work. Get into the mansion, find the anomalies, complete your daily quota, and leave. The company said there isn't any life or death risk, but you may face "weird" things. It doesn't sound too dangerous. Easy peasy.... right?

name: Voron: Raven's Story
summary: In this story-driven adventure, you are the raven from the pages of Norse legends. Fly, explore an open world, uncover its secrets, solve puzzles, save souls, and help your family. Caw!

name: Voice Party
summary:
Party games on a whole new level! Transform any ordinary get-together into a super-fun party with 4 amazing games guaranteed to get people laughing! Includes Secnetnes, Noise Master, Sillyrics, and Story Bomb.

Record a sentence and play it back in reverse. Now everyone tries to say that sentence in reverse, and Voice Party records each attempt. Voice Party will play back everyone’s attempts in reverse to see who came closest to saying the original sentence. Get ready for pure nonsense!

Charades with a twist! Without speaking, use sounds and gestures to demonstrate the target word. For an even bigger challenge, you are only allowed to make sounds. How good are you at imitating the cry of an eagle?

Sing the totally random phrases that Voice Party matches to well-known songs. Create and record your nonsensical karaoke musical masterpiece! Just because the lyrics are absurd doesn’t mean you can’t sing your heart out.

Record individual sounds and use them to string together fun stories with your friends. Will you weave a story that actually makes sense? It doesn’t matter!
Connect with friends and see who can rise to the top of the leaderboard as the most skilled party-gamer! Grab some drinks, open a bag of chips and get ready to have a blast: it's time for Voice Party!

name: Vosphia
summary: Vosphia is a singleplayer RPG set in a medieval fantasy world. Encounter various enemies to fight, build your own base in the world of Vosphia, craft numerous items, and explore the vast world of Vosphia.

name: Voxie Tactics
summary: Free-to-play tactical RPG inspired by retro games of the 90s-2000s. Embark on epic quests, battle fierce enemies, earn VOXELs and game items that you truly own.

name: Void Terrarium: Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:

- Collector's Box
- void tRrLM(); //Void Terrarium
- Sporific Sounds
- Status Apparatus
- "A.I. Love You" Label Pin set
- "Tori-Gotchi" Lenticular Keychain
- "Hand-plucked Hope" Poster (*While supplies last)

name: Void Crew
summary: Void Crew is a Chaotic, Co-op Roguelite game for 1 to 4 players: Outfit your spaceship and crew for thrilling quests, brave fierce enemies in Space Battles... and try not to panic!

name: VoidWalker: Call of Insomnia
summary: Immerse yourself in the world of dreams and discover its secrets, enjoying every moment thanks to photorealistic graphics

name: Voice of Cards: The Beasts of Burden
summary:
Voice of Cards: The Beasts of Burden, is a new standalone turn-based RPG adventure, that brings players to an illustrated world presented through the medium of cards as the third release in the Voice of Cards franchise, now giving players the ability to trap the monsters they defeat in cards to use them as skills in battle.

This truly unique gaming experience brings back the creative minds behind the previous Voice of Cards games, beloved NieR series and Drakengard series, including: Creative Director, YOKO TARO (Drakengard series, NieR series), Music Director, Keiichi Okabe (Drakengard 3, NieR series) and Character Designer, Kimihiko Fujisaka (Drakengard series).

name: Voltaire: The Vegan Vampire
summary: An action-farming-roguelite, full of whimsical flora and mischievous creatures that really want to ruin your dark and mysterious plans of… Going vegan!

name: Voin
summary: Fight hordes of enemies in fast-paced first-person hack-and-slash battles. Explore the world of dark fantasy filled with secrets and dangers, and master your skill of wielding primordial elements.

name: Voidigo
summary: Voidigo is a chaotic and colorful roguelite shooter with a focus on dynamic and unique boss fights. Equip the many weapons and powerups to fight back the void corruption throughout the worlds. Hunt or be hunted.

name: Voltage Box
summary: Voltage Box is a challenging puzzle game where players must overcome obstacles to activate a set number of switches in each level. For those who love a challenge, try activating all the switches and collecting all stars in each level to achieve a perfect score.

name: Void Crawler
summary: Void Crawler is a horror game set in a dystopian future, where you pilot a vehicle nicknamed 'The Mole' into a mysterious void deep within the Earth to collect an extremely valuable material for a company dedicated to solving the world's energy crisis.

name: Votum
summary:
Votum is a short horror adventure game inspired by classic RPG Maker horror titles. Play as The Girl as she finds herself inside a desolate mansion with no memories of how she got there. Explore and discover memories, secrets, and a wish to be fulfilled.

There are two endings to find.

name: Void Inside
summary: Void Inside is a first-person psychological horror that immerses you in a supernatural reality. Remotely resembling the human world, this place is filled with horrifying entities incomprehensible to the human mind. Your goal is to survive and maintain your sanity

name: Voxelgram 2
summary: A 3D nonograms game where solving puzzles feels like sculpting in three dimensions. Reveal voxel models as you complete each challenge. This edition adds puzzles in two colours and procedurally generated puzzles.

name: Voracious
summary: This is a math addition and subtraction puzzle game.

name: Vogvhathos
summary: As an elf in a panicked flight from home, you discover a more dangerous secret; a human claiming to be a dragon.

name: Voodoo Nightmare
summary: Voodoo Nightmare is an isometric action game with puzzle elements. The game world consists of a jungle and five temples which have to be cleared. To do so, Boots need to travel inside the temples, collect all diamonds and offer them to the temple god. In return he receives a magic ability for this voodoo doll which allows him to proceed somewhere else in the jungle. Some of those diamonds are hidden and need to be found by killing the correct enemy or by performing actions, e.g. jumping puzzles or sliding blocks correctly. Fruit and additional jewels act as currency and can be reinvested inside the jungle shops which have useful items in stock, e.g. weapons, dynamite or maps. If Boots feels lucky, he can also visit casinos.

name: Volatile Triangle
summary: Volatile Triangle is a hardcore turn based puzzle platformer. Prepare yourself for a challenge as these deceptively simple puzzles will require more then just good aim. Memorization, accuracy and problem solving will be your only friends along the way, oh... and you will die.... alot.

name: Voyage Senki VR
summary: Sailing in the blue ocean and exploring a new world is a dream in people's nature. Voyage Senki VR is a game of sailing, exploring and adventure. Start a great expedition and Create a new land with your genius and talent of construction, manufacture, and protection. With VR device, you may sense a great achievement created by yourself with very newly experience in game. Choose a way freely in many different options in game with RPG, SLG, MOBA elements. Building a invincible country with your friends in a new blue legend continent

name: Vocanova
summary: Vocanova was a mobile game developed by Bplats, Inc. starring the Chinese Vocaloid Luo Tianyi. It was built for the iPad 2 and up, and can only be purchased through the Chinese iTunes.

name: Volcano Jumper
summary: The floor has turned into lava. Escape the volcano by stepping on various objects! Use the W, A, S, D key to move and press space to jump. Can you find the hidden super jump?

name: Vortex Attack EX
summary: Galaxy is in danger with hostile ships swarming from the opening vortex. Blast the swarming hordes with huge variety of upgradeable ships. This frenetic arcade space shooter featuring worldwide leader-boards and intense local multiplayer mode will keep you playing until all ships are unlocked and galaxies saved.

name: VortX
summary:
VortX is a casual arcade style game featuring a black hole, a space ship and asteroids.

The gameplay is simple but challenging: Evade from the asteroids as long as you can while the singularity prevents you from actually escaping the scene. Collect and use your PowerUps wisely.

The game starts quite easy but it quickly gets harder over time. Can you survive more than 5 minutes?

name: Void Miner
summary: Mine the void. Call the eclipse. Consume everything. Void Miner is a flashy, relaxed, self-paced idle-roguelite hybrid built around 30-60 minute runs, full of powerful builds and bizarre weapons.

name: Void Survivors
summary: Void Survivors is a fast-paced action roguelike game where you have to survive relentless hordes of monsters for 20 minutes!

name: Voxel Tycoon
summary: Voxel Tycoon — a tycoon strategy game about transportation, building complex factories, and mining in a beautiful voxel landscapes.

name: Voodoo Garden
summary:
Welcome to the Voodoo Garden! You're owner of a little hut in a bustling swamp. With the help of little spirits you can earn powers and gold by producing various voodoo supplies.

In Voodoo Garden you plant trees, shrubs and herbs in order to grow various fruits, leafs, mushrooms and more. By harvesting your plants and catching wild swamp animals you gather ingredients for your production of occult accessories. And you're not alone. Cute pets keep you company. Feed and raise them and you have the option to make a sacrifice and summon little helper spirits. There are many new plants, totems and animals to unlock, purchase and upgrade. Have fun expanding and improving your enchanting garden!

name: Void Excursion
summary: A spaceship speeds through the void of space as you try to reach the edge of it. Avoid the planets and debris so you can go as far as you can into the stars!

name: Void
summary: Void is a visual novel themed around espionage and revenge. You play as Arthur Woods, a man seeking revenge from the death of his loved one, forging himself into a deadly assassin. Along the way, you will meet people who may (or may not) be your allies, as you try to untangle the web of lies and intrigue surrounding your girlfriends death.

name: Voxel Blast
summary: Voxel Blast is a game where you control a spaceship traveling across complex 3D environments to fight enemies in cages set to trap them with you. Navigate as fast as you can through the level to reach the beacons or risk facing squads of enemies already waiting for you; then use your weapons and evasive maneuvers to take them down in bright colorful explosions.

name: Void Terrarium 2: Deluxe Edition
summary:
Deluxe Edition includes:
- The Game
- Digital Soundtrack (download code)
- Softcover Art book

name: Vorozhey
summary: Vorozhey is a psychological horror inspired by Slavic mythology. It tells the story of an artist haunted by terrifying visions and ancient forces.

name: Voice of Belldona
summary: Voice of Belldona weaves a story of swords, magic, and sci-fi! The game features roguelike decks, turn-based combat, JRPG elements, and customizable builds. Choose a character and combat style, explore randomly generated maps, power up your team, crush your enemies and... interact with a cute loli?

name: Void Reforest
summary: A 2.5D puzzle-platformer where almost all technology has gained consciousness and taken control. You play as a robot in a post-apocalyptic future, exploring neo-fictional environments in search of the last hope for survival.

name: VoidCraft Island Chronicles: Sky Survival
summary:
In "VoidCraft Island Chronicles: Sky Survival," you find yourself as a nomadic explorer cast into the mysterious Void, a world with its own secrets and surprises. This enigmatic realm invites you to uncover its hidden mysteries and navigate its unique landscapes, each filled with challenges and unexpected encounters.
Construct and enhance your sailing vessel to better equip yourself for the journey ahead. Starting with a simple raft, you'll develop it into a formidable vessel complete with a ship's hold, mast, and captain's cabin. Customize your vessel with various objects, from storages and workbenches to decorations, making it truly your own.
As you traverse the surreal terrains of the Void, you'll confront numerous foes and navigate through ever-changing environments. Whether you journey solo or uncover unexpected twists along the way, the Void promises an unparalleled adventure waiting to be experienced, testing your survival skills and resilience.

name: Voyage
summary: A short horror game about working on a boat in the middle of nowhere.

name: Void Runner
summary: Survive for as long as you can by teleporting to avoid obstacles, but teleport too soon and you might end up inside one.

name: Voxelgram
summary: Voxelgram is a 3D puzzle game in which voxels must be removed according to hints on their sides, to reveal hidden model. It's a new adaptation of Nonograms also known as Picross and Griddlers.

name: Void Guard Outpost
summary: In Void Guard Outpost you build powerful towers to defend your gate against endless hordes of enemies! This action-packed tower defence game offers tactical depth, epic maps and challenging battles. So, are you ready to stop the invasion?

name: Void Eclipse
summary: Void Eclipse is turn-based strategy in an immersive sci-fi world, blending card battle tactics with 4X grand strategy. Explore the stars, Evolve your army and Fight an alien threat. Help characters or harm them - will you be Feared, Admired, or Respected?

name: Void Source Origins
summary:
Void Source Origins is a top-down shooter game set in space

You control a spacecraft that can shoot 4 different weapons (collectable as bonuses), travel at very high speeds and orbit planets.

name: Voltage
summary: Set in the town of Frontier, Missouri, in the 1980s, young man called Mark finds a prototype of VR-glasses. And to his surprise, the glasses are compatible with his Amiga 500. He launches a game and step in to an incredible adventure..

name: Voice of the Ocean
summary: Voice of the Ocean is a single-player adventure about a lost world, and the echoes of a forgotten past. Use your voice to sing ancient melodies and explore a world lost beneath the waves. Dive into the depths to uncover the power within your song and learn why you may be the last of your kind.

name: Voltron: Cubes of Olkarion
summary: Voltron: Cubes of Olkarion is an action-packed one-on-one real-time-strategy game with fighting and puzzle elements all set in the universe of Voltron: Legendary Defender.

name: Voodoo Fishin'
summary: Voodoo Fishin is an online co-op horror game featuring fishing, proximity voice, and scary monsters. You and up to 3 friends can venture into the swamp to find the best fishing spots holding the rarest fish. BEWARE: Die along the way, and you will lose your catch!

name: Void Authority
summary: A sci-fi roguelike document-inspection game where you approve or deny alien travelers, scan for contraband, and navigate shifting galactic laws across border outposts, with each run shaping the future political climate.

name: Void's Blight
summary: Void’s Blight is a Horror Atmospheric Platformer. The void has taken over the world leaving you as the only sole survivor of its onslaught. Can you survive long enough to rid the world of the Void’s Blight?

name: Volgarr the Viking II
summary: A hardcore, 2D action-platformer where only precision can keep you from death.

name: Void Pyramid
summary: Void Pyramid is a post-apocalyptic RPG set in the space-faring Egyptian empire. In the far future, the maniacal Prime Pharaoh rules the wastelands of Earth. Any who oppose him are exiled to the Void Pyramid. This outer space prison is populated by criminals, beasts, and mutants.

name: Volcano Climber
summary:
The lava is coming fast, keep climbing! Simple touch mechanics, challenging obstacles and a retro arcade feel...
An explorer inside an infinite volcano full of coins, items and tricky platforms. And all he's got is his less-than-optimal jetpack! Better than nothing!
Volcano Climber is an infinite arcade game for iOS and Android.

name: Void Destroyer
summary:
Combining the best of space combat and real time strategy. Victory can be tactical, a dogfight or capital ship slugging match - depending on how you decide to achieve it. 
 
A desolate asteroid field on the edge of the solar system erupts in war. Your forces rely on you to take the battle to the enemy. Build up defenses and fleets, repair and upgrade your command ship, lead your forces to reclaim and conquer territory.Game play: 
The seat of a fighter, the bridge of a cruiser and a tactical battle map are your tools of war. Void Destroyer puts you in command and gives you ultimate freedom over the your forces and the art of war.

name: Void Future
summary: In void future, you play as a hacker in a cyberpunk world ruled by corporations. Hack, solve puzzles, and uncover a global conspiracy. Hunted by a system that never sleeps, you’ll need to stay hidden, outsmart surveillance, and fight to survive.

name: Void Destroyer 2
summary: All you have is a basic ship, barely fit for combat, with it you'll start your journey and empire. A space sandbox, inspired by the classics and standing on their shoulders.

name: Void Stealer: Bodycam Horror
summary: Survive the hostile wilderness of the Cluster in a ferocious bodycam trip to find the source of a mysterious Delta radiation. Use its power to turn yourself into the deadliest hunter and knock the shit out of the most horrifying beings of the multiverse.

name: Void Slayer
summary: Void Slayer is a fast-paced shooter with a unique twist, where the arena is also your health. Armed only with your magic gloves, fight through countless hordes of enemies, advance your power and fight to avoid falling into the Void.

name: Voidblade Shadows of The Realm
summary: A Halloween-themed platform adventure, where you wield the Voidblade to face dark creatures, explore mystical settings, and free trapped souls in a cursed realm.

name: Void: Edge of Existence
summary: Take part in the Epic Adventure of Andral as he overcomes multiple Trials within the Edge of his own Existence to Reclaim his Soul.

name: Voxel Farm Island
summary: You now have a dream island right away! Take care of the farm, develop business, Expand transportation, and there are more interesting things on the island, such as magical giving tree, fishery and the mine full of treasures... You have a most important task - to solve the mystery on the island!

name: VoidGate
summary: VoidGate is a third-person Diablo style dungeon crawling game. It consists of randomly generated dungeons, lite survival elements, and permanent death. The combat consists of strategic real-time action, using different styles of melee combat, ranged combat, and magic. There is no class system, as it allows absolute freedom of the player to choose their attributes, stats, and skills. However, there are some class archetypes for players who may want to choose a narrower suggested path.

name: Void Raiders
summary: Void Raiders is a turn-based Sci-Fi tabletop strategy game. Supports Multiplayer Co-Op for up to four players. Provides cross play functionality between players on Steam, Oculus VR and PlayStation 5.

name: Voidronaut
summary: Voidronaut is a fast-paced 2D arcade shooter set in the endless darkness of deep space. As the last surviving pilot, you must outmaneuver relentless enemy waves, collect new weapons, and sharpen your aim, speed, and reflexes to survive.

name: Void Echo
summary: A psychological horror game where players explore eerie liminal spaces through the lens of an old camera. Solve environmental puzzles, uncover hidden paths, and survive lurking threats in a surreal, non-linear world that blurs the line between reality and dreams.

name: Voraxis
summary: The planet is alive, and you are the parasite. VORAXIS is a roguelike deckbuilder where every card determines how you dig through a mutating, organic world. Carve through shifting tunnels, evolve your deck, and harvest the planet's heart before it digests you.

name: Void Light
summary: Survive. Endure. Repeat. Avoid creatures and survive as long as possible across various star systems.

name: Voxel Verse
summary: A building game where you can make any structure and even a marble track!

name: Voices of the Void
summary:
You work as a scientist in the isolated research lab in the mountains of Switzerland. Your task is to gather signals from space, analyze them, process them and sell them to get points.

You can get regular signals and objects like dwarf planets and stars, or you can get something "unusual" or even "strange" and "unexplainable".

name: Void Pachinko
summary: Build your own pachinko! Upgrade pins and balls, unleash powerful synergies, and help a shattered village rise again in this incremental adventure.

name: Voidstepper
summary: Experience the elegance of pure black and white in this unique platformer. Navigate through puzzle- and action-packed levels, manipulate gravity, and destroy terrain to overcome obstacles. Dodge mines, lasers, and turrets as you defy gravity and outsmart challenges.

name: Você é um Defunto Mecânico
summary: Você é um Defunto Mecânico is a short interactive fiction game about a deceased mechanic remembering how he died, and the tortured lives that are now left behind.

name: Volcano Princess
summary: After the war between humans and demons, you found a baby on the battlefield and became a father. You will Plan time and courses for her, bring her into contact with various roles, and raise her up. The daughter's future and the ending of the volcano country depends on each of your choices.

name: Voivod: The Nuclear Warrior
summary: A run-and-gun metroidvania set in Voivod’s dystopian universe. Battle biomechanical mutants, explore a twisted post-apocalyptic world, and recover fragments of your lost mind. Featuring pixel-art visuals, tight action-platforming, and Voivod soundtrack.

name: VoidExpanse
summary: Explore the vast reaches of VoidExpanse -- mine asteroids, upgrade your ship, trade, complete missions, advance your character and survive fast-paced combat with hostile aliens and mercenaries in the rich and exciting Sci-Fi universe of VoidExpanse!

name: Void: Icarus
summary: Is the year 2074. The alien race named as the Cosmonauts arrived and conquered Earth 14 years ago. In this 2D Side-Scroll Shooter everything goes around Icarus, our main character, who got his hands on a strange artifact capable of save it's bearer from certain death.

name: Volt Patrol
summary: Become a stealth driver in this short, minimalist game and try to sneak smoothly through the security system Volt Patrol!

name: Voidbound
summary: Voidbound is a mining adventure where you explore random caves, fight dangerous enemies, and upgrade your abilities. Can you find your way back home to the void?

name: Void Sails
summary: Void Sails is a single-player adventure where you captain a flying ship across uncharted space. Sail through mysterious worlds, battle powerful foes, and make story-defining choices. Uncover dark secrets in a game where every discovery could bring you closer to the truth—or to madness.

name: Void Terrarium++
summary:
The last living human is depending on you in Void Terrarium++! Rediscover a bleak yet charming story of a young girl named Toriko and her robot protector, along with extra features such as new afflictions, outfits, and an new environment to explore.

System Upgrade:
Void Terrarium++ looks and performs better than ever on PlayStation5, and comes bundled with additional content like new emotes, outfits, hairstyles, and Toriko diseases.

Legacy Protocol:
Void Terrarium’s amazing visual style, unique roguelike gameplay, and caretaking system all make a return.

Hope in a Cold World:
From the creator of A Rose in the Twilight and htoL#NiQ: The Firefly Diary, this harrowing roguelike adventure combines cute visuals with a somber yet whimsical post-apocalyptic story.

This edition's new content was announced in Japan alongside a DLC pack for the PS4 and Nintendo Switch that included the new diseases, customization feature and interactions with Toriko.
The DLC has not been announced internationally.

name: Void's Rage
summary: Void's Rage is a fast-paced, ultra-responsive hack'n slash game inspired by arcade games. With each match, improve your combat reflexes, achieve the highest scores on the leaderboard, and defeat the evil creatures of the void once and for all.

name: Vox Manipuli
summary: The king is dead! Tame chaos in this unconventional strategy with autobattler and puzzle elements, set in a fantasy setting. As the King's Regent, manage your Councilors so that they vote accordingly to your will. Manipulate, trigger synergies and win debates!

name: Voodoo Vince: Remastered
summary: The classic character platformer is back after 13 years and newly remastered! Help Vince run, jump and fight his way through cemeteries, swamps and an evil carnival as he seeks to save his creator Madam Charmaine from the clutches of Kosmo The Inscrutable.

name: Voidnomicon
summary: 2d platformer, action, adventure - "Metroidvania" set in fantasy world filled with ancient magic and monsters. Pixel art graphic with anime style.

name: Voden's Job
summary: Voden's Job is a small roguelike deckbuilding game where you have 7 rounds of experiments to collect enough DNA to evolve your specimen. Between each experiment, you can upgrade your deck with new cards, combos, and strange tools. The catch? Upgrading costs DNA, so you'll need to carefully balance how much you're willing to spend each round.

name: Void Memory
summary: You, who was born in a world full of darkness, should wander this hollowed land to find the Relics for a person who created you. However, fallen and lost souls with trap-filled trials await in your course of doing so. Can you survive in this crumbling world and start a new era?

name: Volkolak: The Will of Gods
summary: "Volkolak" is a 2D action game in the dark fantasy world. Immerse yourself in the dark atmosphere of the game and explore mysterious caves and catacombs, the Dead Wastes, the Dark Forest, the Serpent's Backbone and much more. Fight the legendary creatures of Slavic mythology!

name: Void Dash
summary:
A simple endless runner arcade game about dodging dangerous asteroids.

Use powerups to break your highscore and collect Voidbucks to unlock new skins in the shop.

name: Voltorb Flip
summary: A blast from the past! This game originated as a minigame in Pokemon Heartgold and Soulsilver is the perfect marriage of Minesweeper and Picross taking all the best aspects of both. Voltorb Flip is a relic from a past game that asserts itself today as a stand alone puzzle *experience*

name: Voxel Playground
summary: Voxel Playground is a physics-based voxel sandbox VR game

name: Void Resurgence
summary: Void Resurgence is a fast-paced top-down bullet hell roguelite shoot 'em up. Combine upgradeable Core Systems and unlock Hyper Power combos to create devastating builds, and survive relentless waves of enemies, bosses, and explosive arcade action.

name: Volantia: Kingdom in the Sky
summary: Transport yourself to a lush kingdom in the sky as you create, explore, build, and optimize a thriving new ecosystem amongst the clouds. Amidst the lush greenpunk landscape, rotate and conjoin fragments of land onto your floating island to stabilize it, and stop it from crumbling to its demise.

name: Volvox
summary: Volvox is a puzzle game based on a triangular grid. The characters, called Trimoebas, are triangular unicellular organisms undertaking the building of the first pluricellular beings, traveling through the evolution and the 250 levels of the game. The Trimoebas bear functional properties on their sides, such glue, explosive, insulating and hooks, but they are useful only if the Trimoeba is correctly rotated: you will have to prepare the right path and make the Trimoebas overstep each other to bring them in the right position with the right phase. Developed and published by Neotenia.

name: VolticPistol
summary: Take control of the Tholos, a renounced knight on his quest to overthrow his former kingdom! Battle your way to the top of the kingdom in this action-filled medieval-cyberpunk adventure!

name: Void Grimm
summary: Void Grimm is a real-time deckbuilding roguelike game. Fight your way through waves of enemy spaceships. Your survival in the fast-paced battles requires quick thinking even at increased adrenaline levels. Gather your crew, optimize your deck and utilize card synergies to master your runs.

name: Voltorometer Recharged+
summary:
A remake of the game Voltorometer, released in 2009, with improved graphics, sound, controller support and more than 3 times the amount of content.

A simple platformer, run and jump to reach the end of each stage and progress through all the worlds to destroy the factories that trapped you and tried to harvest your electrical energy, unlock new modes and challenges by collecting all the power orbs in each level.

name: Volt Ventures Idle
summary: An idle game of growth and strategy. Build, upgrade, and prestige your way to limitless power.

name: Void Runner
summary: Live the dream of being a parkour runner in a world where clouds are not the limit!! Run, climb, explore the void world and reach the space, but do not fall, The higher you go, the harder it gets .

name: Voir Dire
summary:
An absurd jury-packing auto-battler created in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 55: "Summoning"

This game takes about 10-15 minutes to complete and has a definitive ending. Hang in there 'til the end!

name: Volleyring
summary:
Hedgehogs cannot play volleyball because their spines might pierce the ball.
Instead they choose volleyring - essentially the same game, but using a ring
from Sonic's universe. The rules are simple: send a ring to opponent's side,
don't touch the net or ground. Hedgehog have to jump to strike the ring, but
three consecutive contacts with it is a fault. Match is played to 15 points.

Left player is Sonic the Hedgehog, right player is Shadow the Hedgehog. Both
are controlled by players using joysticks or cursor keys. Press [ 1 ] in the
main menu to choose Sonic's controls, press [ 2 ] to pick Shadow's controls.
Press [ S ] to start match. Note that there is an easter egg in the game!

name: Voyager-19
summary: A short horror game where you control a decaying spacecraft exploring distant star systems.

name: Volt Recharge
summary: Race customizable RC cars in intense multiplayer battles! Split-screen, unique abilities, and dynamic tracks await. Get ready to dominate the competition!

name: Voidling Bound
summary: Hatch, evolve, and upgrade powerful space creatures in this action-packed sci-fi 3rd person shooter that reinvents the monster taming genre!

name: Vole Complexity
summary: VOLE COMPLEXITY is a top-down puzzle-game, which will boil your brain. Guide Charlie the vole through a lot of different mazes which are getting more and more complex. Move bunches of blockers, outwit plenty of pits and bring Charlie back home savley.

name: Vole Complexity
summary: VOLE COMPLEXITY is a top-down puzzle-game, which will boil your brain. Guide Charlie the vole through a lot of different mazes which are getting more and more complex. Move bunches of blockers, outwit plenty of pits and bring Charlie back home savley.

name: Voxel Horizon
summary: Create your own voxel world! Collaborate with your friends at your own level! The battle over destructible terrain!

name: Voodoo
summary: Voodoo is a multiplayer open-world survival game set amidst the fantasy wildlife of primal Africa. Champion the call of your tribe by hunting, gathering and crafting resources, building your village, and battling for territory and domination at the dawn of civilization.

name: Void Protocol
summary: Void Protocol is a 3D ​​hardcore puzzle​​ game built on ​​Temporal Imprint​​. In an indie-crafted cyberpunk lab, freeze/rewind objects' states (position, activation, motion) to crack ​​impossible puzzles​​. Manipulate causality—every action sparks solutions or paradoxes.

name: Void Protocol
summary: Void Protocol is a 3D ​​hardcore puzzle​​ game built on ​​Temporal Imprint​​. In an indie-crafted cyberpunk lab, freeze/rewind objects' states (position, activation, motion) to crack ​​impossible puzzles​​. Manipulate causality—every action sparks solutions or paradoxes.

name: Vocaless
summary: Vocaless is a unique platformer game with rhythm elements, you must perform all of your actions to the beat! Not only that, but everything in the game, from enemies to obstacles, follows the beat of the music.

name: Vosaria: Lair of the Forgotten
summary: A pump-action 2D side-scrolling game with different enemy types. along with a jump-to-the-roof mechanic that spices up the combat.

name: Void Bastards
summary: "Inspired by BioShock and System Shock 2, Void Bastards is a revolutionary new strategy-shooter that will test your wits as well as exercise your aim. Can you lead the misfit prisoners of the Void Ark through the derelict spaceships and myriad dangers of the Sargasso Nebula?"

name: Voxel Eras
summary: Voxel Eras is a game about collecting, crafting, and automating within an infinite 3D voxel world. Taking your humble workshop made with your own two fists through eras of technology. Design, build, and evolve your operations, all in the name of progress.

name: Void Roots
summary: Void Roots is an autobattler Roguelite, widely influenced by the randomness. You'll find a range of upgradable tools , allowing you to manipulate your chances, and the choices you'll make will directly influence your progression.

name: Void Collector
summary: Void Collector is a fast-paced first person shooter with a unique weapon switching system and a focus on speedrunning.

name: Voxelony
summary: Voxelony is a Colony, Strategy game, Where you control anthropomorphic lizard colonists and gather resources with other creatures in the same world with full of surprises.

name: Voltage Fighter Gowcaizer
summary: Stones of power are given to some chosen fighters, who are being trained by a master to defeat the master's darker tendencies of destroying humanity. The fighters do not necessarily get along even as the world heads toward peril.

name: Void/Breaker
summary: VOID/BREAKER is an Adrenaline-Fueled Roguelite FPS. Fight relentless machines driven by a hostile AI. Escape an endless cycle. Craft infinite weapon variants with deep gun modding. Forge deadly synergies. Carve your way out through environmental destruction/BREAK THE SYSTEM /BREAK THE SEQUENCE /BREAK FREE

name: Void Raid
summary: A cooperative space horror about raiding derelict ships: breach compartments, grab the loot, and make it back to your own vessel before the oxygen runs out — or before something lurking in the dark gets to you.

name: Voidwalker
summary: Voidwalker is a dark Twin-Stick Shooter Roguelike in which you control the Walker, a defeated King who fights to rebuild the broken world. Upgrade your abilities and survive in this relentless world of darkness.

name: Void Hazard
summary: Trapped in a zero-gravity space station twisted by a corrupted AI, you must survive a labyrinth of shifting corridors and relentless obstacles. Scavenge for resources, upgrade your suit, and fight your way through terrifying threats.

name: Vowel Movements
summary: In Vowel Movements you race against the clock to group words together into categories. The only catch is that each of the vowels has been replaced by a different vowel. Surely that can’t make things too difficult…

name: Void Harvest
summary: Condemned to work in an endless void, you must mine ore from asteroids, search wrecks and upgrade your ship to survive. Explore vast spaces, unlock upgrades, manage your crew and avoid constantly changing threats. Can you survive your sentence?

name: V.O.I.D.
summary: V.O.I.D. is an all-new side-scrolling action adventure game made by NAPE GAMES! Taking the best aspects of the 8- and 16-bit era classics, and transforming them with modern tech & fresh mechanics, into something new and exciting!

name: Void Point
summary: Explore mysterious caves in a secluded village, solving puzzles and uncovering secrets of otherworldly technology to find your missing uncle. Are you ready to take on the journey?

name: Voidwell
summary: Voidwell is a simple sandbox, spell slinging, roguelike. Fight enemies, find tools, spells, and secret items, and grapple with a dark truth about your rightful place in the void.

name: Voidzone
summary: Voidzone is a first-person horror game. As a cleaner, your job is to cleanse these "anomalies" in the city's dark sectors, also known as Voidzones. But the choice is yours, escape this fate or follow your duty? This is your story; trust your instincts and make the right decision.

name: Voyagers of Nera
summary: Voyagers of Nera is a cooperative seafaring survival-crafting game for up to 10 players. Sail across a magical ocean world, skim along the waves, and protect lost nature spirits from monsters emerging from the depths.

name: Void Vanguards
summary: Void Vanguards is a sci-fi action shooter with rogue-like elements and intense planetary exploration. Each planet offers a unique environment - defeat every enemy wave, gather their resources, and unlock/upgrade your weapons to advance further into the void.

name: VoidExpanse: Pariahs' Bane
summary: In this expansion you will face a new threat to the sector - a group of renegades know as Pariahs, led by the infamous Shank Twice. Pariahs are in the habit of asking favors no one can't refuse, and you might become one of those unfortunates. Dive into a brand-new storyline involving pirates, sabotage and gang wars.

name: Void Dementia
summary: Void -Dementia- is a rogue-like action game that takes place in a void zone. The game features stylish fast action and hardcore production and difficulty. It is an action game that will amplify the user's sense of challenge and immersion in the game with the story and roguelike elements of the voice area.

name: Volleygon
summary: Volleygon is a raucous 2-on-2 anti-gravity showdown where geometric shapes flying through space take center stage! Utilize the ceiling and floor to bounce, lob, and smash the ball into your opponent's zone! Just be careful as the ball can change gravity on a whim, but so can your opponents!

name: Voyage: Journey to the Moon
summary: Make fantastic discoveries and dare to go into the deepest depths of the moon to solve puzzles that will allow you to go back to Earth.

name: Voodoo Dice
summary: Roll the dice in a mystical world filled with exploration, puzzle-solving, and adventure! Mixing action based and puzzle mechanics in a 3D world, Voodoo Dice is an innovative, challenging puzzler that plays with your mind to lead you to solve puzzles in unique and interesting ways.

name: Void Wizard
summary: Dual-wield wands to levitate, manipulate time, conjure explosions, and use other unique abilities in this fast-paced FPS roguelike! Explore procedurally generated dungeons. Buy powerful upgrades from suspicious looking shopkeepers. Defeat the void wizard.

name: Volcan Defend the Tower
Void Foundation: Into The Void
summary: Void Foundation: Into The Void is a JRPG game with SCP & Randomized dungeon exploration element. Void Foundation tells the story of a future world which human history has been rewritten due to the discovery of Void Gate Players will be recruited as void adventurers, discover the secrets of the void.

name: Void Frontiers
summary: Void Frontiers is a survival roguelike set on randomly generated floating islands. Gather resources, craft tools, build your base, and defend against nightly enemy waves. Play solo or team up with up to 4 other players, customizing your playstyle with over 40 unique enhancements.

name: Void Stalkers
summary: As the pilot of a Void Rig, it's your job to transport dangerous creatures to various research facilities across the system. Use your ship's security cameras, drone, and other systems to solve problems and stay alive as you travel through The Void.

name: Void Bastards: Bang Tydy
summary:
Clean up your messy nebula with the Tydy DLC! Tydy adds a whole new org to Void Bastards as well as a brutal new weapon, a fiendishly dangerous new opponent, new ships to loot and the opportunity to collect additional heart starters, giving you a chance to keep your favourite client alive or beat that ironman challenge.

Tydy vans roam the nebula dispensing neat-freak Tydy bots into every ship they visit. Although Tydy bots aren’t hostile, to them you’re just another dirty, dirty object to be vacuumed clean. Unfortunately for you, Tydy vacuums suck the very air out of your lungs, making it hard to hang around.

name: Void Marauders
summary: Lead a band of space pirates and loot and pillage your way across the stars in this turn based tactical game!

name: Voidship: The Long Journey
summary:
