Voidship: The Long Journey is a 2D top-down space combat/strategy game. 
 
You are the captain of a modular spaceship entrusted with a mission which might take centuries to complete. Gather resources, crew and technology to build your spaceship into a titan warship to fulfill your objective. 
 
If you love exploring and battling through unknown quadrants of space with a fully customizable warship… Voidship: The Long Journey is for you!

name: Void Stranger
summary:
Void Stranger is a 2D sokoban-style puzzle game where every step counts.

Descend into the forgotten labyrinth teeming with fiendish foes and traps that defy reason. A swift defeat lurks at every corner for those who neither study their surroundings nor think their moves through with care.
Trust you wits and slowly, surely, you will conquer the mysteries before you.

You do remember why you are here, right?
Or have you lost something?
Something very important to you.

name: Voxile
summary: Explore gorgeous raytraced voxel lands, meet the local mutated wild-life, find out what went wrong, and quest, craft, loot, build, destroy and shoot your way to the top of the foodchain! Play alone, or with friends! Assuming you know how to share..

name: Voidtrain
summary: Become a crew member of an interdimensional express! Discover a new mysterious world inhabited by amazing creatures, dangers and surprises. Upgrade your train, gather new materials and build better weapons! Available in single player, or in online multiplayer with up to 4 people.

name: Void Miner
summary: Blast. Collect. Upgrade. Repeat. Void Miner is a retro-inspired roguelite asteroid shooter where you pilot a space ship and manage an automated tower to destroy endless fields of chaos. Dodge, blast, and harvest your way through waves of asteroids in a fast-paced loop of destruction and progression.

name: Void Scavengers
summary: A sci-fi co-op horror game driven by exploring procedurally generated abandoned space stations.

name: Vostok 2061
summary: Vostok 2061 is a modern graphic vertical scroll-shooter. Gorgeous alien worlds, a lot of spaceships, bright explosions, secrets, various bosses, and a great soundtrack!

name: Volleyhalla
summary: A frantic fantasy ping-pong battler! Also sheep!

name: Void Prison
summary: Void Prison is a fast paced, endless arcade twin stick shooter that puts you inside of an ever shrinking ring. Survive by fighting emerging enemies around you and don't get consumed by the void. Complete achievements to unlock new skins and powerups and get on top of the leaderboards!

name: Voodoo Chronicles: First Sign - Collector's Edition
Voice of Cards: The Forsaken Maiden
summary:
Voice of Cards: The Forsaken Maiden is a RPG set on a remote chain of islands that have been protected by the maidens for generations, but which now face destruction. The hero of the story vows to save the islanders and sets sail for the high seas, together with Laty, a girl who failed to become a maiden.

A touching tale set in a world of melancholic beauty, brought to you by the creative minds of Yoko Taro, Keiichi Okabe and Kimihiko Fujisaka.

name: Voodoo Detective
summary: Do you like adventure, comedy, and dime store detective novels? Then boy have we got the game for you! Join Voodoo Detective in a story-rich, hand-drawn noir where you’ll pit your wits and hoodoo know-how against a sinister evil that’s taken root on beautiful Zo Wanga Isle.

name: Voxel Drive
summary: Voxel Drive is a captivating car simulator that immerses you in a world of voxel graphics. You'll navigate numerous tracks full of obstacles and challenging turns.

name: Vortex: The Gateway
summary: Vortex: The Gateway is an open world survival horror game with two game modes. If you want to survive then be alert, sneak, build and fight. Meanwhile life back on Earth changes dramatically. What changes? You will get bits of information through your adventure. Prepare for the worst!

name: Void Source
summary: Classic multi-directional (360°) shoot 'em up. Navigate your UFO through hazardous environments with dangerous enemies and beat huge bosses!

name: Volgarr the Viking
summary: Remember when games were tough? Return to the Golden Age of arcades with an all-NEW hardcore action experience that pulls no punches. Volgarr the Viking possesses all the hallmarks of the true classics - simple controls, high challenge, and meticulous design - combined with hand-made pixel

name: Voices from the Sea
summary: Follow the story of a young boy, Cantus as he meets Maris, the mysterious girl by the sea — an experience that will change his life forever.

name: Void War
summary: Command an ancient starship and fight your way to the heart of a dying Empire. Fend off attacks from demented cultists, craven space pirates, and xenophobic Imperial soldiers. Discover powerful artifacts and use them to build your ship into a fearsome war engine.

name: VooDoo Kid
summary:
VooDoo Kid is a Windows PC Adventure game.

"Who’d have thought it? Who could possibly have imagined it? A kid, a kid just like any other. A tired little boy reading his book. A tired little boy… so tired… then wide awake and all alone… A prisoner of the unfriendly, unearthly Baron Saturday, king of the Zombies, master of the Voodoo Cult and lord of poor Kid’s shaky future..."

name: Volty's Quest
summary: Chargers will keep Volty alive, but you will have to use his power to control things in the world.

name: Voidwalkers: The Gates of Hell - The Devil's Towers
summary: Enter a new hell scape and launch an assault on The Devil's Towers! You and three of your allies must defend three weapon emplacements, while attempting to breach the nine towers that defend a Hive.

name: VoxelMaze
summary: VoxelMaze

name: Vordakk's Keep
summary: This wad is a replacement for Map 01 of DOOM2, and is my attempt at a Plutonia-style level. Expect a very challenging adventure with some nasty battles and rather unfair ambushes, all in the spirit of The Plutonia Experiment.

name: Voidspawn
summary: A somewhat small and uncomplicated map for Boom (-cl9).

name: Volleyball
summary:
Game 43-44 of Video Olympics - A volleyball simulation where the traditional (Pong-style) left-right volley is swapped for a top-bottom volley. Players can volley or spike.
This is a downgrade from the arcade version called rebound to make it fit in the muli cart Video Olympics

name: Vokabulantis
summary:
Vokabulantis is a video game about the first time you held hands, where all you see is crafted by hands.

The game is a puzzle platformer, you can play as co-op or single player and it’s targeted multiple platforms.

name: Void Rogue
summary: Void Rogue is a Shoot Em' Up Platformer for Game Jolt Contest 9. Controls are found in the game itself. The game features fully procedural level generation, and three unique enemies to fight.

name: Volley Court
summary: This is a 3D volleyball game developed by an actual volleyball team member. Whether you have ever played volleyball or not, you can enjoy the fun of this sport here. Support multiplayer online battle! You can call up to 11 friends and form two teams to battle.

name: Voidless
summary: Voidless is a space survival sandbox set in a realistic scale solar system. In first or third person, players can explore planets and asteroids, collect resources, and craft items. As they progress, they can build bases and ships, all with realistic physics-based flight and combat.

name: Vox Populi: Spain 2023
summary: Play as an existing or fully customized political figure, and campaign for the Spanish general election of 2023! In "Vox Populi: Spain 2023", you and the characters around you will have to promote your ideas and your popularity throughout the country to claim victory!

name: Void Arena
summary: VOID ARENA is a fast paced first person RPG with classic ARPG combat & loot Systems. Featuring a multiplayer game mode which uniquely combines PVE & PVP.

name: Voices of Authority
summary: A mission-based level from SalaciusCrumb, You will have to slum it through a deactivated defence ship.

name: Voxel Warfare Online
summary: Warbit Union took an oath to find and destroy all the active terrorists worldwide. You can join Warbit Union and fight for such honorful mission.

name: Voxel Tactics
summary: Voxel Tactics is a strategy RPG where you take command of a band of plucky heroes as they journey across a vast and dangerous world full of magic, monsters and mighty empires!

name: Voidwalkers: The Gates of Hell - Hell's Dungeon
summary: Enter Hell's Dungeon and travel through a new experience. Crawl through a series of endless dungeons, hack the terminals, and destroy any zombies that cross your path!

name: Void
summary: There is nothing in void. Discorver new things in this empty place, and give them your own meaning. In this quiet space where converge to zero, Can you find a miracle?

name: Void
summary: Welcome to the strange world of VOID. You find yourself engulfed in darkness, the only way to see is to move around. Each corridor feels more confusing than the last, hints of sights and sounds may lead you to victory or astray. The only hope is to keep moving forward.

name: Volden Idle
summary: Grind your way to 99 in this MMO inspired idle/clicking game!

name: Voyager
summary: A first person spacecraft shooter using polygon graphics.

name: Volcano Planet
summary: This game is a score attack type game where you rotate the volcano star with the [W][A][D] keys and destroy the meteorite with the lava part to earn a score.If a non-volcanic part of the star hits the meteorite, it will be a miss. Earn a score before you miss.

name: Volcano Snek
summary: A short snake-like metroidvania

name: Voice
summary: Voice is a game about the story of living in a dystopian world where speaking is forbidden.

name: Volcanic Field 2
summary: The Earth's crust has been weakened, and magma is continuously flowing through its cracks.

name: Vogue Tales
summary: Vogue Tales it's a time management game based in a clothing shop.

name: Void Golf
summary: Shoot an asteroid through the galaxy.

name: Voidhunter
summary: In a dystopian spacefaring future, mankind struggles to maintain their humanity. Take control of devastating spacecrafts, upgrade their loadouts and offer justice to the highest bidder. Become a space-traveling mercenary. Become the voidhunter.

name: Void Destroyer 2: Big Red
summary: The Big Red DLC expands the Void Destroyer 2 ship line up with additional ships from the Digger faction.

name: VoxreD
summary:
The action takes place deep underground, the main enemy "Voxler" kidnaps the younger brother of the protagonist 
and puts a difficult task: to get a card and a difficult to guess a riddle, and if you do not unravel, all knitted begin!

name: Volleyball Trainer: The Legend of Sports
summary: Become the best volleyball coach and lead your team to success! Play this adventure where card games are combined with the mythical Arcade mini-games. You will have to be agile and think fast if you want to win all the tournaments and take the victory.

name: Voyager EP
summary: Voyager EP is a single-player/co-op WAD containing five adventurous, space-themed maps, offering a wide range of gameplay experiences ranging from fierce action to gentle exploration. Each map took direct inspiration from one of the five tracks featured on Tristan Clark's Voyager EP, released in 2021. This mapset was created to show our appreciation for @Tristan and his extremely respectable body of work, musical and otherwise, and additionally to commemorate his 27th birthday this July!

name: Volted
summary: Tanks, flying cars, giant bugs, lots of guns, bullet rain - it's INSANE! PS: don't forget to take your friends with you.

name: Void Islands
summary: Are you a prey or predator, a world where magic moves you through the islands of void.

name: Voxeldom
summary: Voxeldom is an open source voxel mmo with both server and community driven worlds, quests and items.

name: Void Rangers
summary: Fast paced arcade first person shooter defense game for VR devices. Randomly generated loot, Endless waves, Upgrades & Leaderboards. Our galaxy is under attack by our own AI and only you can stop it.

name: Voce.
summary: Game made for BGS JAM

name: Void Monsters 2: The Blight
summary: Summon and train hundreds of unique monsters, and build a party strong enough to turn back The Blight.

name: Void's Calling ep. 2
summary: "Void's Calling" - is a visual novel game with RPG elements where every decision you make can drastically change the course of game's story. Episode 2 contains QTE and combat system is more complex than in Episode 1. Be aware that Ep.2 is very different from Ep.1 in terms of game mechanics.

name: Voidcrisis
summary: Voidcrisis is a four-player tower offense game on an undulating battlefield. Operate combat bio-machines called VA (Vital Armor) drawn with dynamic mechanical art shaders and work together to clear high-difficulty stages.

name: Voyeur Hotel
summary: A rather professional looking multilevel hotel map

name: void.Resign
summary: A text adventure game inspired by Edgar Allan Poe's The Cask of Amontillado.

name: Volstead
summary: Strategic turn-based game ambiented in USA 1920 when the Volstead act was declared. From 1 to 5 players in hot-seat mode. Fully replayable with lots of possible strategies. Game mechanics easy to understand. Around 20-60 minutes per game. Texts in English and Spanish.

name: Vos en Haas: Het ij van uil
Volcanic Planet
summary: You have to descend several levels to get near the crater of the volcano in order to detonate a bomb near it.

name: Voxel Race
summary: Climb aboard your vehicle and become the master of the track!

name: Voidrun
summary: Voidrun is a fast-paced bullet-hell arcade game where you have to encircle your enemies to defeat them.

name: Voidrunner
summary: Voidrunner is a Multiplayer & Single Player Flight Shooter game set in an exotic universe called the Void. We reintroduce easy FPS controls to flight combat genre with large, open landscapes for fun and addictive flight experience.

name: Voodoo Lunch
summary: Twiggy was born in a small village lost in Zululand's jungle. Being by nature very superstitious, the members of his tribe decided to send him far away from the village. They were too afraid that Twiggy's ugliness would bring bad spirit on the village. They asked him to leave and not come back unless he brought back enough treasures to give as gifts to the spirits. That's how began Twiggy's most exciting adventure as treasure hunter. Be careful not to become a voodoo's lunch!

name: Voxelia Defenders
summary: Voxelia Defenders - is fast-paced, fun and engaging tower defense game, that will take you into the magic world of Voxelia!

name: Volatile Particle
summary: Play as a particle with the power to manipulate your electronic charge. Leverage the laws of physics to complete levels, collect gems and set records.

name: Void Surfer
summary: Harvest the galaxy, Design the perfect ship, Annihilate your enemies!

name: Vorum
summary: Vorum is a retro-inspired RPG with elements of noir, horror, investigation, and science fiction. Its narrative is somewhat inspired by recent events in humanity, with touches of philosophy. It's a post-apocalyptic world with problems similar to our own.

name: Voidlifted
summary: Run and develop your kingdom. Go on missions and help save the world by conquering all lands.

name: V or B
summary: You have to pick one: An assassin imp or a succubus?

name: Vote: The Game
summary: In Vote you can beat up both of the United States’ leading presidential candidates. The game is made by the creators of Infinity Blade in the Unreal Engine.

name: Void Warfare
summary: The void is vast and dark. Sectors are patrolled by various vessels of Alien origins. Select a ship from the 40 available options, configure their weapon mounts and launch into instant action Space Vehicular Combat.

name: Vor Terra
summary: In Vor Terra the player takes on the role of a Knight, who is attempting to restore order to his land and become its ruler, after the old King died and the kingdom turned into a wasteland in chaos, it's inhabitants now suffering from plagues, thieves and monsters.

name: Voice Fantasia: Ushinawareta Voice Power
summary: An adventure game for PlayStation and Saturn.

name: Voyager
summary: Complete every mission to unlock the next ones. Avoid asteroids, scan the surface of the specific planets to get all the information and send it back to Earth!.

name: Voyageur
summary: Permanent descent into ever-changing galaxy.

name: Vos en Haas: Het plan van Haas
Vortex Escape
summary: Your ship is caught in a vortex, try to escape while avoiding obstacles. On the way you have a helper orb to assist you.

name: Vortex
summary: Vortex is a retro styled physics driven local multiplayer top down shooter where the goal is to fly around in neat looking spaceships and kill your opponents by making their lives miserable.

name: Void And Rainbow
summary: As once listening to Annihilator and playing one old game, I thought: what if I make mountains hovering in space that will shimmer with the colors of the rainbow? As a result, having threatened for one year and one month to some extent, I realized what I had planned. It was difficult for me alone to do everything, and so I called for help TheSkyBug, who made weapons, some monsters, and a bunch of different trifles, and also ZZYZX, who made a new lighting system. Big thanks to them. Also thanks to ChaingunnerX, DOOMGABR, Dagamon, VladGuardian and other people for help of various kinds - without you this wad would come out much later.

name: Void Inc.
summary: A dark incremental management game, created for Ludum Dare 37

name: Voidseekers
summary: Voidseekers is a 1-4 player co-op horror FPS. Shoot, salvage, and survive as you explore abandoned ships in deep space. Risk it all to bring back the largest prizes, but beware the horrors that seek in the void.

name: Voxella
summary: Welcome to the world of Voxella! Here we see a young Muigi plopped into the world, with nothing to do but discover. Complete quests for other people, find treasures, explore dark caves and mysterious factories, unlock the secrets of the world and have a friendly conversation with a giant spider! Because, in the world of Voxella, everything is a conversation topic if you try hard enough.

name: Void Titan
summary: A unique side scroller with roguelike elements, collect and craft in order to stop giant, terraforming machines that consume the world behind you.

name: Voodoo Dolls
summary: Voodoo Dolls is a first person action shooter, where you need to escape the Witch's Spooky Castle. Fight through endless corridors in 90s style mazes and dungeons.

name: Vox Populi: Brazil 2022
summary: Play as an existing or fully customized political figure, and campaign for the Brazilian presidential election of 2022! In "Vox Populi: Brazil 2022", you and the characters around you will have to promote your ideas and your popularity throughout the country to claim victory!

name: Volleyball Xciting
summary: Volleyball Xciting is a very arcade-like and light volleyball experience for those not looking for that ultra realistic feeling many sports games try to achieve. It features an all girl cast of cell-shaded manga girls, starting out with 8 teams but more are added as you unlock them along with more courts to play at as you progress through the game. The game contains several modes of playing, such as World Exhibition and Beach Volleyball, and you can play as many as 4 people at the same time with the aid of a multi-tap. You never have to move the players around the court yourself as they do it themselves, and you just have to time the shots with the corresponding button to make them whack the ball across the net.

name: Volfoss
summary: Volfoss is a tactical role-playing game developed by Namco for the original PlayStation. It was released in Japan in 2001

name: Voidhunter

**Simple and Quick

Choose from the variety of 3D templates, just follow the number and fill in the colors. Rotate the screen to color in different dimensions.

**Stress Relief

Coloring is a stress-relief therapy and 3D coloring will give you more sense of achievements. Take your time and enjoy it！

**Educational

It is important that even youngest can color in 3D, so that they become more aware of what a real world means. Having real objects colored, also, can get the children to better understand what they are studying.

Scavenge for technology in derelict ancient alien ships. Explore small outposts and massive corporate stations. Take risks and survive in the void.

name: Vocabulary Galaxy Orrery
summary: Vocabulary Galaxy Orrery is a game which helps learners to memorize 300 basic words in Simplified Chinese, Japanese, German, French, Russian, Spanish, English or Brazilian Portuguese. Vocabulary Galaxy Orrery is a complementary casual tool that can be used as a part of a lesson.

name: Voidwalker
summary: Embark on a distorted journey as Voidwalker, battling chaotic entities and unraveling secrets to save your universe. With retro graphics and the Quake engine, brace yourself for intense first-person shooter combat.

name: Vortex
summary: The player is cast as a soldier fighting the Aki-Do Forces, an evil empire bent on taking over the entire universe. To stop them, the player has access to an experimental mech, the Vortex, to travel the seven worlds of the Aki-Do system and destroy the bases.

name: VonGarland Castle: Sacrilege of the Night
summary: VonGarland Castle : Sacrilege of the Night a love letter to action platformer classics like Castlevania, Super Metroid and Mega Man X.

name: Voyager 2
summary: Launch the Voyager space probe to the furthest depths of the Solar System! Use gravity to slingshot around planets and scan, orbit, or land on targets to earn stunning replays of your accomplishments.

name: Volvo: Drive for Life
summary: An advertising game for Volvo focusing on the safety of the vehicles.

name: Voyagers
summary: Voyagers is a simplistic strategy game/city builder about building your own sci-fi metropolis on exotic planets. Starting out as a mere colony you'll grow into a striving city.

name: Vortix
summary: What do you get when you combine marbles with a battle royale ring and PvP? Vortix! Vortix is an online competitive game where the objective is to knock your opponent or opponents out of the shrinking ring!

name: Volcanewt
summary: Volcanewt is an action city destruction game where the goal is annihilation. Destroy the city, defeat the WWDF and their creations, and save? the Hawiwi Archipelago.

name: Vow of Vengeance
summary: Vow of Vengeance is a collection of 12 fast-paced, action-packed levels with themes of tech bases, caves, hell and snowscapes. It features midis by Dragonfly, Ax34, Jimmy and Eris Falling.

name: Voenkomat
summary: VOENKOMAT is a social game. This game makes it possible to become a worst enemy of russian teens and guys - military comissar. You need to send to the army as many as possible soldiers, protect yours military HQ from foreign spies and save your soul from karmic devastation.

name: Void Wisp
summary: The rules of Void Wisp are simple: Gain points by getting close without crashing. Lose points by playing it safe. Distance isn’t important. Simple controls and custom game options means anyone can pick up and play this high score focused ambient runner.

name: Void Link
summary: Casual "takes-1-minute-to-learn" Space RTS, designed for VR: Gather resources, build your fleet, seek out rivals, craft custom ships, and go to battle, in truly 3-dimensional playgrounds. 2-Player online, competitive.

name: Void Explorer
summary: A deceased king has resurrected himself to take over his former kingdom. He has killed the king, taken over the castle, and put the land in ruin. It is up to you to stop him and restore peace to the land.

name: Voidstorm
summary: Voidstorm is an on-rails shooter in space with twin stick controls. Fight epic space battles against fleets of enemies, engage and destroy capital ships, evade through narrow passages and save the federation together with your wingmates.

name: Voice of Pripyat
summary:
Voice of Pripyat is a 3D Action first-person shooter in a post-apocalyptic world with zombies, anomalies, huge maps, intense realtime battles.

You can use a lot of artefacts and consumables to give you advantage in battle. For example, a "Jumper" artifact will give you ability to jump very high. And "Bear Trap" consumable allows you to catch your enemies.

name: Volcanic Core
summary: Thrilling vehicle combat within a musical universe! Face fierce pilots & reach a near unbeatable boss... Train to improve your skills or venture in very diverse challenge areas.

name: Voidwalkers: The Gates of Hell
summary: You are one of the Voidwalkers, tasked with a life-long oath to defend the Gates Of Hell from any who would try to cross into the land of the living. After a thousand years without incident, thousands of undead warriors have begun crossing the plane, and it's up to you to stop them!

name: Volcanic Bird: Bird Quest
summary: Volcanic Bird: Bird Quest fuses a traditional JRPG combat system with creature collecting and a text-adventure style game structure.

name: Vortica
summary: Vortica is a 2D action roguelite set in a solar system overrun by hostile aliens. Suit up, loot up, and shoot up as you battle against enemy hordes, explore derelict outposts, and hunt giant bosses. Each mission gets you one step closer to reaching Earth and saving the human race.

name: Vox Populi: Germany 2025
summary: Play as an existing or fully customisable political figure, and campaign for many alternative German elections! In "Vox Populi: Germany 2025", you and the characters around you must promote your ideas and your popularity throughout the country to claim victory!

name: Volley Bomb
summary: The game Volley Bomb is a variation on the subject of volleyball. From volleyball it is necessary what to play the main difference not a ball, and a bomb. The purpose of game to blow up a bomb on the territory of the opponent. The bomb blows up, if it concerns a floor, there were more than three contacts of a bomb or time of burning of a fuse ended. Before the beginning of game choose quantity of bombs. Besides, you can choose complexity level, a way of moving and a place of the player. For a jump you should concern the screen in any place, besides, which is used for traffic control.

name: Vorpal
summary: When it comes to vertical shmups, not everything is black and white. There's also some red!

name: Voxel Turf
summary: Voxel Turf is a block based urban sandbox. Build cities, blow up buildings, complete missions or fight for territory. Build a real estate empire, or perhaps just drive around and blow stuff up. Its your choice!

name: Void Hearts
summary: In this game you'll play as a young boy who has been cursed with the power of emotions. Change your abilities based on your choices and harness the power of all your emotions, whether it be for the better of others or the better of yourself. The choice is yours!

name: Volot: Red Odyssey
summary: Year 1980. The sun dies out and humanity, led by the Soviet Union, looking for a new home. In this tactical turn based game you have to take on the role of the commander of the Volot detachment - the instruments of communism - in order to find this home, and, if necessary, take it by force...

name: Void Warden
summary: Void Warden is a unique mix of Turn-Based Combat and Tower Defence. Build a powerful roster of guardians from the last survivors of a doomed world. Customise and co-ordinate your party in order to defend against apocalyptic horrors. Can you hold back the darkness?

name: Voice of Steel
summary: An online robot fighting simulator where you can build your own character from 16 modules. You're able to create your own strikes and use them all (up to 32) in combat. Each module has its own health points and can be torn off. But you can fight without arm or leg.

name: Void Monsters: Spring City Tales
summary:
Hoping to escape your destiny as a monster trainer you left the home of your famous parents to find your own way in the world.

Within two years of leaving home your parents had been murdered and now you've been called back to inherit their failing farm.

With the farm heavily in debt to the bank, and with a burning desire to find and kill your parents' murderer the only option is to take up the mantle of monster trainer and the destiny you tried so hard to escape.

name: Volleyball
summary: Magnavox Odyssey launch title, sold separately. Two players use paddles to knock a ball back and forth on a screen; uses an overlay of a volleyball court, and players must knock the ball over the net for scores to count. Uses game card number 7.

name: Vocal Warrior
summary: A voice controlled mobile fighting game.

name: Voxel Printer
summary: Make your own voxel art masterpiece in this colorful game.

name: Void Bastards: Deluxe Bundle
summary:
The Deluxe Bundle contains the Void Bastards main game and Bang Tydy DLC.

Forget everything you know about first-person shooters: Void Bastards asks you to take charge, not just point your gun and fire. Your task is to lead the rag-tag Void Bastards out of the Sargasso Nebula. You make the decisions: where to go, what to do and who to fight. And then you must carry out that strategy in the face of strange and terrible enemies.

name: Void Soul
summary:
"Alright, we're going to rush to our target destination."

Endless revenge and twisted longing for family.
Steampunk fantasy of two emotions burning like fuse till the end begins now!

The story of an empire reigning over the desert continent and revel train confronting the empire.

name: Voxquest: The Firebird
summary: An open world fantasy adventure in a voxel art style! Explore a massive, continuous overworld with puzzles, upgrades, a variety of weapon aspects and six dungeons. Play with keyboard or XBOX-style controller.

name: VoxelMancy
summary: Dive into VoxelMancy, a revolutionary online voxel sandbox where you can build anything imaginable with friends! Forget simple cubes – sculpt slopes, curves, and structures of any size with over 1500 PBR materials. Your imagination is the only limit!

name: Voyager
summary: Come with us now on a journey through music and space... To the world of Voyager! Take it easy and create your own gorgeous emergent journey!

name: Voxel Baller
summary: Challenge your breaking skills and tackle the obstacles in this frenzy action game! Voxel Baller invites you to rediscover the brick-beaking genre with 50 unique levels. Will you clear them all?

name: Volkstein
summary: Ouvbane, a vicious demonic trickster, has come back to life. And only Cauflin can stop him. Why? Because why not? He doesn't really want to. He'd rather stay home, but Ouvbane took his wife. And she brings home the bacon. And Cauflin really doesn't want to get a job.

name: Void Reaper
summary: Pilot your ship through the Void in 'Void Reaper'. Face diverse enemies, upgrade your ship, and battle bosses to reach the End Boss in this action-packed void odyssey. Can you destroy the Void and save the world?

name: Voxel Tank VR
summary:
Voxel tanks can easily operate tanks!
A large explosion if the bullet that fired hits an enemy tank! Feeling is exhilarating!
Let's move it well and avoid enemy attacks!
It's a gameover when To be attacked receives enemy bullets five times!

name: Vox
summary: Vox is a voxel based, action, adventure and creation game with a big focus on player created content and in-game customization on all game objects, such as characters, items, weapons, equipment, monsters, NPCs, world terrain, scenery, quests, etc.

name: Voxelstein 3D
summary: A free small voxel-based game which is still in development and is loosely inspired by Wolfenstein 3D. Uses Ken Silverman's VOXLAP engine.

name: Void Mother: Survivor
summary: Conquer Void Mothers horde of fever dream creatures in this action packed horde shooter. Theorycraft with player passives and navigate a fast paced world with randomly generated items whilst battling your way to become an unstoppable force.

name: Voxel Pirates
summary: Voxel Pirates is a simple pick-up-and-play action game where you defeat enemies with a variety of weapons in an adorably quirky fantasy world of toys. A golden age of piracy has come upon the toy world of Voxel! Pirates roam the seas, spending their days gathering treasure. Set sail into a world of great ships, secret bases, and port towns!

name: Void Terrarium++: Deluxe Edition
summary:
The last living human is depending on you in Void Terrarium++! Rediscover a bleak yet charming story of a young girl named Toriko and her robot protector, along with extra features such as new afflictions, outfits, and an new environment to explore.

Deluxe Edition includes: Void terrarium++ game for PS5, official soundtrack CD

name: Void
summary: Void is a Chinese Yume Nikki fangame. You play as yukiko, a girl who can't/doesn't leave her bedroom. The objective is to explore the dream world and collect effects.

name: V.O.D.K.A. Open World Survival Shooter
summary: V. O. D. K. A. is a survival shooter in the open world, the game takes place in a fictional state in eastern Europe, most of the territory of which is infected with radiation. Your main task is survival.

name: VolChaos
summary: Volchaos is an ultra-challenging old school platformer.

name: Volzerk: Monsters and Lands Unknown
summary: Volzerk: Monsters and Lands Unknown is a Monster Breeding Action RPG. Explore the world as Fina and raise legendary monsters!

name: VoiceOS
summary:
Voice Box Games comin' back at ya with a Tubular, High-Res experience for your home computer! No more driving all the way to the arcade to play your favorites: just play VoiceOS, a short game about doing too much all at once!

Made for Mini Jam 100 by Angus Goucher, Braeden Trefethen, and Jacob Nelan.

name: Vocaluxe
summary: Vocaluxe is a free and open source singing game, inspired by the original UltraStar (developed by corvus5) and the great Ultrastar Deluxe project.

name: Void Core
summary: You are tasked with continuously feeding the void core's insatiable hunger with essence to unlock new items and tiles to fill your desolate world with. Start with nothing. Play mini-games at the game machines to earn more essence. Exchange the essence for things. Fill the void.

name: Void Encounter
summary: Void Encounter is a 3D FPS alternative to currently very popular impostor-hunt games. Void Encounter takes that concept a bit further and features creepy level design, lighting features and random or impostor-initiated events.

name: Void Lands
summary: A fast-paced 2D action RPG where you play as a skilled archer battling through intense monster hordes, epic boss fights, and loot-rich arenas. Customize your abilities, find powerful gear, and master dynamic combat in a world filled with endless challenges and upgrades.

name: Voxel Doom
summary: A mod that replaces 2d characters and props from Doom with fully 3d voxel-based models. For the GZDoom source port.

name: Vox Populi: Poland 2023
summary: Play as an existing or fully customisable political figure, and campaign for the Polish parliamentary election of 2023! In "Vox Populi: Poland 2023", you and the characters around you must promote your ideas and your popularity throughout the country to claim victory!

name: Voxel Crusade
summary: RTS and RPG in one game! Build your castle and see it from the view of your villagers. Design your character - build and defend your castle - get an army - fight...

name: Voxel Doom II
summary: Voxel Doom II is the follow up to 2022's award-winning Voxel Doom. This is a new graphics mod that replaces all monsters, weapons, props and items with fully 3d voxel models. It replaces all monsters from both Doom and Doom II.

name: Void Invaders
summary: Void Invaders is a colourful, chaotic and explosive arcade game with simplistic retro-styled graphics. Blast your way through more than 30 levels filled with enemies, huge bosses and destructive power-ups while upgrading, earning achievements and unlocking secrets.

name: Voice of Flowers
summary: Embark on an epic adventure full of perils and secrets. Explore distinct forsaken lands of Devetlam and fight your way by jumping on your enemies or showering them with a plethora of magic spells. An open-world platforming action inspired by the classics.

name: Voice of God
summary: Shake the ground with your Godly voice!

name: Void Guard
summary: Follow the Void Guardian as she inspects a space station after receiving a distress beacon from it and help her vanquish the hidden evil.

name: Voyager
summary: Confront alien adversaries, explore uncharted planets, and unravel the mysteries of the cosmos. Customize your spacecraft, engage in epic space battles, and decide the fate of humanity. Become the hero the galaxy craves – are you up for the challenge?

name: Voyager
summary: Voyager is a game for iPhone and iPad that is made with needle felted wool and stop-motion animated. You feel as though you are floating through a dream. Zoom through space! Avoid planes, satellites, asteroids, planets and unexpected creatures lurking in the darkest depths of this galaxy and beyond. Tilt to control. Press and hold the screen to slow down time, and help get yourself through even the trickiest of asteroid belts.

name: Volk-san: Egg&Catch
summary: A very tiny, cute, and rather fast-paced game about an egg-loving wolf catching eggs.

name: Voodoo Girl: Queen of the Darned
Voodoo Castle
summary: You are Count Cristo and a curse has been put on you. Your have to lift the curse in this text adventure using two word commands.

name: Vortex
summary: Vortex is an iPod game created by Apple Inc. and Kabloom Games. It is an Arkanoid/Breakout clone with a top-down perspective and bricks arranged in a circular layout.

name: Voxel Galaxy
summary: "Voxel Galaxy is set in a near-future world that is a blend of space and cyberpunk. Use various weapons and equipment to take out your enemies in this easy-to-play action game. " "Voxel, year 20XX. On the planet Voxel that resides in the far reaches of space, a rebel army struggles in their battle with the Voxel Empire who are plotting to rule the Milky Way itself.

name: Volleyball!
summary: While the packaging promises "an electronic simulation so real you can even spike a shot", this is in fact a volleyball game which has a very loose interpretation of the standard rules. In fact, it can be described as a cross between volleyball and Pong: Each six-man team is separated by a large line, which the casual observer would interpret as the net. The line is open at the top, and this is the only place where the ball can pass through into the other court. While the ball is in your court, it can be passed as many times you want, and bounced against the "net" and the back of the court. As long as the ball doesn't touch the bottom of the screen, it is safe. The joystick moves the entire team in strict formation, and the ball passes through the players if they are held still, or bounced in the direction they are moving. A status display at the bottom of the screen writes out in clear text whether there is a serve change, a spike, scoring or otherwise.

name: Void Scout
summary: Save reality one mission at a time! A seemingly unimportant Void Scout gets thrown into the middle of an interdimensional war, as the only one who can prevent the Exoforms from consuming reality. Strategize, plan, and execute in a suspenseful tactical roguelike. Save the multiverse and die trying!

name: Voxel Battle Simulator
summary: Voxel Battle Simulator is a voxel-based tactical game. Deploy your units on the battlefield and watch as the struggle unfolds in this simple and humorous, voxel-based tactical game. Featuring 90 levels of a single-player campaign spread across 6 different world environments. Pit units against each other in the sandbox mode and see which army comes out on top once everything turns to rubble.

name: Voyage of the Dead
summary:
This isn’t your normal stress-free cruise. After the zombie outbreak, you’ve got to fight to make it out alive. Voyage of the Dead lets you choose your character and use everything you got to protect the passengers. Build your best team and wield your weapons wisely in this desperate race for survival! Voyage of the Dead is a thrilling game designed for users aged 18 and up. Fight with friends to make it out alive!

This MARS Light Gun couch co-op game is set on a cruise ship overrun by a zombie outbreak, with up to 4-players caught in the chaos. Voyage of the Dead is an action-packed zombie shooter with a quirky art style and a campy sense of humor. 8 playable characters pick up pistols, rifles, rocket launchers, alien weapons, and more in the fight against a horde of undead menaces.

MARS LIGHTCON and IR STATION are required to play.

name: Volleyball Challenge
summary: Volleyball Challenge is a Sports game, published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2003.

name: Volatica: The Devil's Trap
summary: Volatica. The Devil's Trap – is a hand-drawn rogue-like with RPG elements and an original turn-based combat system. Take on the role of the Witch, who fell into a trap and try to deceive the Devil himself!

name: Voice Commander, a Microsoft Garage project
summary:
Voice Commander, a Microsoft Garage project, is a fast paced, space themed, RTS and top-down shooter combo. Pick up a controller and work with Vox using voice commands to try to stop relentless attacks. Voice Commander can be played with up to eight controllers, and anyone in the room can issue voice commands.

Microsoft Garage turns fresh ideas into real projects. Learn more at microsoft.com/garage

name: Volvalis
summary: Experience a dark, epic RPG mystery laden with multi-faceted characters and dangerous secrets! Unfolding with a soundtrack carefully implemented for maximum storytelling and emotional impact, the lost land Volvalis beckons the intrepid....

name: Volt
summary:
You were on the way to a recycling process when fortunately for you - and unfortunately for the environment - you accidentally ran off.

Now your goal is to escape from the facility, which is an extremely difficult task due to the fact that you are a battery without legs. Equipped with a limited number of electric beams, you can connect to walls, move or destroy objects, turn switches, and charge generators.
You also have the ability to jump or push off the walls - the rest is up to physics and gravity.

name: Volleyball
summary: Volleyball is one of the fastest team games around, and this NES classic recreates the speedy sport in a way that anyone can play.

name: Vows of Eternity
summary: You are an aspiring writer hoping to get into university. You leave the comforts of the countryside to pursue your studies, but getting a scholarship seems a lot harder than you’ve imagined! Even with a part-time job at a quaint cafe, you’re barely making ends meet, and the dream of getting a college degree seems to be slipping away from your grasp.

name: Voodoo Vince
summary:
No Pain, No Gain!

Vince was just a voodoo doll in a French Quarter shop, but when his maker was kidnapped, he became a vengeful doll on a mission! Using voodoo powers, Vince must kick his own butt to beat his enemies! If he stand under a falling safe, bad guys get flattened! Stick a pitch fork in him, and his enemies are done!

name: Void Carrier
summary: This game is a difficult puzzle game with many worlds that each have their own gimmicks!

name: VoxelMaker
summary: With VoxelMaker you have both 3D canvas and camera in your hands: be inspired and create!

name: Voice Mimicry Show
summary: Try to imitate the sound by "voice"! The more similar the sound, the higher the score!

name: Vorn's Adventure
summary:
3D platform game for mobile devices. Help Vorn defeat the evil mage! The game features: 
- 7 levels (+1 hidden!), old school boss fight at the end and some cutscenes 
- 5 different quality levels to support a variety of devices 
- achievements 
- translations: English, French, Polish 
- no ads or anything: it's free!

name: Voxrush
summary: Voxrush is a time survival FPS game with a full destructible voxel environment. Kill monsters, take points, upgrade stats and weapons, use skills and find a better way to survive as long as possible to become the best!

name: VolleySmash
summary: Fast-paced 3D volleyball game, perfect for casual gamers, competitive players, and volleyball fans

name: Volcanic Blocks
summary: Volcanic Blocks is a puzzle game in which you must destroy colored blocks by combining them.

name: Void Racer: Extreme
summary:
Hone your skills in single player mode. Race against AI, complete challenges to unlock new events, or shave seconds off your time in fast-lap mode.
Take on racers from around the world in up to 4 player online multiplayer!

name: Void Frame
summary: Void Frame is a 2d platformer. Move,jump and dash ,through various sorts and varieties items, completed one and after levels,meet final boss and defeaut it.

name: Voice: Legacy of Hale
summary: Who will inherit the Hale family legacy?

name: Vostok Inc.
summary:
The Wolf of Wall Street... with lasers. You’re the newly appointed CEO of Vostok Inc. As a greedy, space-capitalist your ultimate goal is to get filthy stinking rich! Pilot your own ship and blast your way through the solar system and collect moolah to help profit your company! With your pockets overflowing, you can indulge in extra mini games, ship and weapon upgrades - all whilst fighting evil bosses and listening to a customizable synth soundtrack.

Vostok Inc. … Live rich and be prosperous

name: Voxel World
summary: A physics sandbox voxel-based simulation game for you to mess with. Build world you can imagine and destroy anything you create.

name: Voyage to Farland
summary: Voyage to Farland is a tough as nails turn-based graphical dungeon crawler inspired by the cult classic Japanese Mystery Dungeon games.

name: VoxelScaper
summary: Build your perfect diorama.

name: Vocalodama
summary: Vocalodama is a mobile game produced by the YAMAHA Corporation using VOCALOID technology.

name: Voxel Drivers
summary: A Voxel race game that contains totally 8 cars, totally 4 races and a big map. When you play the game, you musn't drop down from the map.

name: Voodoom
summary: Voodoom is a casual asymmetric horror game set in a sprawling, eerie mansion. Team up as voodoo dolls to explore, collect powerups, and seek revenge on the monster that cursed you. Or, lurk in the darkness as the giant monster, ready to strike and eliminate the dolls before they grow too powerful.

name: Vorrak
summary: Horizontal space shooter.

name: Void Vikings
summary: Void Vikings is an action packed 2.5D top down space shooter where survival is the focus. Death is the end but the glory from your battles will carry on.

name: Voxel Fly
summary: Fly, fight and survive with your voxel machine.

name: Voidside
summary: Voidside is a high-octane Parkour FPS in which you jump around locations pulled out of time, unlock strange new weapons and fight mysterious threats all while trying to get a high score!

name: Voyage to Fantasy: Part 1
summary: The first part of a hidden object game like you’ve never played before: 135 varied and challenging levels! Fairy tales and legends are trapped in Black Holes. It's urgent! Fantasy is gradually fading out of our collective memories. Take up the challenge and embark on a Voyage to Fantasy, the most beautiful hidden object adventure game!

name: Voice Actress
summary: Seiko is an ordinary and humble student, and at home, she is an online voice actress. Because of her father's work, Seiko's room also has good sound insulation equipment In the work of voice...

name: Vogue
summary: An idle clicker roguelite where you explore the dungeons of Vogue

name: Volumax
summary: Volumax ™ is a rhythm genre, action, fast paced game, made by two man. In volumax you will find two gameplay, Volumax and Volumania, unlimited number of beatmaps , maximum customisation, advanced gameplay options and many more.

name: Void Ninja
summary: Void Ninja is VR action platformer with gesture based controls and few innovative locomotions. Run, glide, dive and hook. Slice and arrow the enemies. Randomly generated levels. Design your own challenges.

name: Volatile
summary: Volatile is a space exploration adventure game which, at its core, plays with the importance of actions and consequences.

name: Vox Populi: USA 2024
summary: Play as an existing or fully customisable political figure, and campaign for many alternative US elections! In "Vox Populi: USA 2024", you and the characters around you must promote your ideas and your popularity throughout the country to claim victory!

name: VoidOut Parkour
summary: Can you escape the Void? Make your way across the sky in this challenging 3D platformer to see if you can avoid being consumed!

name: Void and Meddler
summary: Fragments and details, rainy nights and blurry lights are all VOID&MEDDLER focuses on. A non-linear cyberpunk adventure where genders and species melt into each other.

name: Void Sols
summary: 2D top-down minimalist souls-like. Explore the jail you awaken inside of in this dark and atmospheric action game.

name: Volleyborne: Unbound Horizons
summary: Volleyborne: Unbound Horizons redefines sports gaming with its groundbreaking first-person volleyball experience. Offering realism and immersion, it brings every aspect of real-life volleyball to your screen with unmatched precision. From powerful spikes to insane digs, it mirrors every court move.

name: Voodoo Strikers
summary: Unleash your competitive spirit with this local multiplayer sports game! Random fields and unique ball physics make each match different!

name: Void Strife
summary: Void Strife is an intense, action-packed Bullet-Hell RPG with a twist: your weapons level up, not you! Choose and upgrade your weapons through each unique skill tree, but also choose who to betray and who to trust in this dark damn world. Your responsibility? Don't screw it up. People need you.

name: Voxel Hunters
summary: Fight, die, repeat! Voxel Hunters is a 1-4 player co-op, top-down roguelite shooter. Team up to blast and defend through a sprawling alien solar system. Upgrade, strategize, and face endless challenges in an epic fight for survival!

name: VoxStory
summary:
VoxStory is the cinematic way to experience tabletop roleplaying. Keeping all of your favourite aspects of TTRPGs and bringing them to the big screen, VoxStory is the modern way to enjoy roleplaying.

VoxStory remains true to the tabletop style of gaming, the roll of the dice determines your actions, the Gamemaster will still set the story, atmosphere and scene, but with VoxStory you won’t just have to imagine it, you’ll be able to watch it like your very own movie.

With world creation, the possibilities are endless, you can customise every aspect of your world or use a pre-populated world if you’re short of time. Players can join your world with their own custom characters, gather round, connect to a large screen, such as a TV, and watch your adventure play out.

name: Voxel Works Quest
summary: Mine and Craft in 6DoF, but it's real work.

name: Voipas
summary: Voipas is a virtual assistant for PC, aiming to be a virtual friend. In case you need a companion while browsing your PC, someone to give you an advice when you feel down, to cheer you, give you a virtual kiss or remind you to study for exams.

name: Void Path
summary: "Void Path" is a first-person horror game set in a residential area of ​​Japan. There are no grotesque monsters. You explore a town depicted with retro-style graphics.

name: Voice of Cards: The Isle Dragon Roars
summary: Voice of Cards: The Isle Dragon Roars is an RPG set in a world of swords and sorcery, told entirely through the medium of cards. The story follows a self proclaimed hero as they set off to slay a recently awakened dragon, presented in the manner of a tabletop RPG and playing out through narration from the gamesmaster.
developers: Square Enix Creative Business Unit II

name: Void Climber
summary: Climb to the top of a collapsing universe in this parkour platformer with roguelike elements. Gather resources, spawn platforms, and obtain powerful upgrades to survive before the world crumbles beneath you. Just don’t fall into the void.

name: Void 21
summary: Void 21 is a procedurally generated, arcade style, fast-paced runner and shooter. You are a pilot training with the highly maneuverable and lethal Void ship. Your objective is to reach the end of the level, either as quickly or as violently as possible (or both?).

name: Void Scrappers
summary: Blast hordes of alien ships into junk. Collect the scrap to upgrade your ship into an unstoppable force of destruction. Unlock new characters and weapons and upgrade your stats between runs.

name: Voidwrought
summary: Voidwrought is a 2D action-platformer set in a hand-drawn world of cosmic horrors. Explore the thawing ruins of the First Civilisation and strike down the gods that dwell there. Grow your powers, uncover ancient Artifacts, and expand your shrine amid the wreckage.

name: Voyage
summary: Voyage is a cinematic adventure game capturing the essence of shared exploration. Whether you decide to play by yourself or cooperatively, the journey will revolve around two survivors in search for answers of a long-forgotten past. Embark on a voyage, unravel a mystery and find a way home together.
